name: 20th Century
description: Evoking the glamour of classic rail travel, the 20th Century cocktail delivers a bright and sophisticated flavor journey. Zesty lemon meets aromatic gin, while coffee liqueur adds a deep richness, all balanced by the crisp, herbal elegance of Lillet Blanc. Enjoy this cocktail when you crave a timeless, refreshing experience with a hint of intrigue.

name: Absinthe Drip
description: Indulge in the mystique of the Belle Époque with the Absinthe Drip, a ritualistic cocktail that transforms the intense herbal potency of absinthe into a sophisticated experience. Cold water is dripped slowly over a sugar cube, dissolving sweetness into the vibrant green spirit and causing a mesmerizing louche. Refreshing and aromatic, this timeless drink is both a showpiece and a refreshing sipper for contemplative evenings.

productionSteps.message: Place the sugar cube on an absinthe spoon over the glass, then slowly drip chilled water over the sugar until it dissolves completely and the absinthe louches.

name: Afterglow
description: The Afterglow is a refreshing, alcohol-free mocktail made with a blend of pineapple juice, orange juice, and a splash of grenadine syrup. Served in a champagne glass, this vibrant drink offers a sweet and tangy flavor profile with tropical notes, making it perfect for any occasion when you want something fruity and festive without the alcohol.

name: Alabama Slamer
description: The Alabama Slamer is a vibrant and fruity cocktail, perfect for those who crave a sweet and tangy flavor combination. Crafted with smooth Southern Comfort, nutty Amaretto, zesty gin, and refreshing citrus from orange and lemon juice, this drink delivers a balanced blend of sweetness and tartness. Served ideally in a hurricane glass, it's a lively choice for any gathering or just relaxing with friends.

name: Alabama Slammer
description: Lively and colorful, the Alabama Slammer captures Southern hospitality in a glass. With a bold splash of orange juice setting a zesty, citrus stage, it balances sweet almond notes from amaretto and smooth whisky warmth with the vibrant, fruit-forward punch of sloe gin. This invigorating, easy-drinking cocktail is perfect for sunny afternoons or festive gatherings, offering a playful burst of flavors that keeps the party alive.

name: Alaska
description: A sophisticated and alluring cocktail, the Alaska melds the crisp, botanical notes of gin with the herbaceous, honeyed brilliance of Yellow Chartreuse. A subtle dash of orange bitters accentuates the drink’s complexity, while a touch of water smooths the palate. Ideal for sipping on quiet evenings when you crave an aromatic adventure.

name: Alexander
description: A creamy, decadent cocktail, the Alexander balances the botanicals of gin with the rich hush of cream and chocolatey undertones from Crème de Cacao. Ideal for dessert sipping or elegant evenings.

name: Almond Old Fashioned
description: An elegant twist on a timeless classic, the Almond Old Fashioned delights with the nutty smoothness of Amaretto perfectly blended with bold Bourbon. Subtle sweetness from simple syrup and a dash of aromatic bitters create a deeply flavorful, warming experience ideal for contemplative sipping after dinner or to celebrate special moments.

name: Aloha Screwdriver
description: The Aloha Screwdriver is a vibrant twist on the classic vodka cocktail, blending tropical pineapple juice and fresh orange juice with smooth vodka. Served in a highball glass, this drink delivers a bright, fruity flavor with a satisfying kick, making it perfect for relaxing afternoons or festive gatherings. Refreshing and easy to make, it's your ticket to island vibes in every sip.

name: Amaretto Sour
description: A celebrated classic, the Amaretto Sour delivers a luscious combination of almond sweetness and citrus freshness. The velvety texture from egg white rounds out the flavor, with aromatic bitters providing the finishing touch. Perfect for evenings when you're craving something both smooth and lively.

name: American Trilogy
description: A tribute to American cocktail tradition, the American Trilogy brings together the spicy depth of rye and the orchard warmth of apple brandy, rounded out with a touch of sweetness and bright citrusy bitters. Perfect for savoring slowly, this refined drink sets the scene for classic evenings and spirited conversation.

name: Americano
description: The Americano offers a refreshing and bittersweet experience, perfect for relaxed afternoons or as a sophisticated aperitif. Its blend of Italian bitters and sweet vermouth creates a harmonious balance, while the soda water adds a lively fizz and lightens the overall character. Ideal for those who savor classic flavors and want a taste of timeless European elegance.

name: Angel’s Delight
description: A silky and decadent classic, Angel’s Delight blends gin, triple sec, cream, and a touch of grenadine for a dessert-worthy experience. Its subtle pink hue and smooth texture make this cocktail a delightful treat, perfect for ending an evening with elegance and a touch of nostalgia.

name: Aperol Spritz
description: Bright, effervescent, and irresistibly refreshing, the Aperol Spritz brings a taste of la dolce vita to any moment. Its vibrant orange hue promises summertime relaxation, while the bittersweet Aperol and sparkling Prosecco merge for a crisp, celebratory drink ideal for gathering with friends or soaking in a sunset.

name: Appletini
description: A crisp and vibrant twist on the martini, the Appletini offers a sweet-tart burst of apple flavor balanced by smooth vodka. Ideal for lively celebrations or a chic after-work refreshment, this cocktail delivers a bright, refreshing sip that dances on the palate.

name: Arabian Sun Mocktail
description: Like a sunrise in a glass, the Arabian Sun Mocktail combines sweet orange juice, sparkling lemonade, and a splash of grenadine syrup for an eye-catching, non-alcoholic treat. Each sip offers uplifting citrus notes and a playful fizz, making it ideal for festive brunches, summer gatherings, or anytime you crave a bright, refreshing drink without the booze.

name: Arizona Sunset
description: A refreshing mocktail that brings the vivid colors and vibrant flavors of an Arizona sunset to your glass. Zesty orange juice merges with citrusy lemon-lime soda, while a touch of grenadine creates a beautiful sunrise effect. It's the perfect thirst-quencher for hot days or any time you want a splash of sunshine—no alcohol required.

name: Army & Navy
description: An elegant classic, the Army & Navy combines bright lemon juice and fragrant gin with the nutty, floral notes of orgeat syrup. Accented by aromatic bitters and a subtle hint of saline, this refined cocktail offers both complexity and balance—perfect for occasions that demand something both refreshing and nuanced.

name: Arnold Palmer
description: Crisp, cool, and perfectly balanced, the Arnold Palmer combines the refreshing tartness of lemonade with the smooth depth of iced tea. This non-alcoholic classic is the ultimate thirst-quencher for sunny afternoons, picnics, and relaxing moments, delivering invigorating citrus and gentle tea notes in every sip.

name: Aunt Roberta
description: Aunt Roberta is notorious for its formidable strength and daring blend of spirits. This legendary cocktail fuses the velvety warmth of brandy, the crisp bite of vodka, the botanical allure of gin, and a powerful herbal kick from absinthe, all balanced by a touch of fruity blackberry liqueur. Ideal for cocktail enthusiasts seeking an unforgettable, bold experience, Aunt Roberta promises an intense, layered flavor journey in every sip.

name: Aviation
description: A balance of botanicals, floral notes, and tart citrus make the Aviation a captivating choice for both gin enthusiasts and adventurous drinkers. Its soft purple hue and delicate aroma invite a timeless, elegant experience—perfect for sophisticated evenings or special celebrations.

name: B52
description: A show-stopping layered shot, the B52 delivers creamy, orange, and coffee notes in three distinct bands. Often a highlight at parties, it's a visual and flavorful delight with rich sweetness and a kick—perfect to savor or impress.

name: Baby Bellini
description: A refreshing alcohol-free twist on the classic Bellini, the Baby Bellini balances tangy lemon juice and rich peach juice, topped with sparkling apple juice for a lively fizz. Perfect for celebrations where everyone wants to join the toast, or as a revitalizing pick-me-up at any time of day.

name: Bahama Mama
description: The Bahama Mama is a tropical cocktail that delivers a sweet and fruity escape in every sip. Crafted with a blend of orange juice, pineapple juice, grenadine syrup, and a touch of rum, this drink offers vibrant flavors that are perfectly balanced for a refreshing and smooth experience. Served in a jumbo glass, it's an ideal choice for relaxing by the beach or bringing island vibes to any occasion.

name: Bahia
description: The Bahia is a creamy, tropical cocktail that transports you to a sun-soaked beach. Bursting with sweet pineapple and smooth white rum, its luscious coconut notes create a vacation in a glass. Perfect for relaxing poolside or dreaming of paradise, this drink offers a refreshingly fruity escape with every sip.

name: Banana Calling
description: Banana Calling offers a creative mix of botanical gin, nutty dry sherry, and bright lemon juice, brightened by lush banana liqueur and elegantly rounded with a whisper of sugar syrup. This dazzling cocktail strikes a perfect harmony between fruit, citrus, and subtle sweetness, making it an ideal choice for those looking to enjoy a unique and refreshingly modern classic. Great for lively evenings and sophisticated gatherings alike.

name: Banana Daiquiri
description: Experience the lush, sun-drenched essence of the tropics with the Banana Daiquiri. This creamy, refreshing cocktail delivers mellow banana flavor enhanced by the zesty bite of lime juice and balanced sweetness from gomme syrup. White rum provides a clean and velvety backbone, making this drink perfect for relaxing on a summer evening or bringing a hint of vacation to any occasion.

name: Banderilla
description: Experience a daring fusion of smoky mezcal, vibrant tequila blanco, and fruity sweetness in the Banderilla. This cocktail brings together bold agave spirits and luscious apricot notes, balanced by tart lime and a gentle bitter twist from Aperol. Raise a glass to celebratory nights and festive gatherings, as each sip offers an inventive burst of Latin-inspired flavor.

name: Bangkok Sunrise
description: The Bangkok Sunrise is a vibrant and refreshing cocktail that brings together the zesty tang of orange juice, the bold spirit of tequila, and a splash of fresh lemon juice. Finished with a dash of grenadine syrup to create a beautiful sunrise effect in your glass, this drink is served in a highball and is perfect for those who enjoy a fruity yet spirited beverage. The combination of citrus flavors and tequila make it an ideal choice to brighten up any occasion.

name: Barbados Sunrise
description:
Escape to the Caribbean with the Barbados Sunrise, a bright and breezy cocktail inspired by the stunning dawn skies over Barbados. This vibrant drink layers tropical flavors with striking sunset hues, making it as beautiful as it is refreshing.

It starts with a generous pour of fresh orange juice, delivering natural sweetness and citrusy zing. Smooth white rum brings a mellow warmth, while a splash of orange liqueur introduces delicate citrus and floral undertones. A final drizzle of grenadine sinks to the bottom, creating a stunning gradient and a hint of rich, fruity depth.

Light, flavorful, and easy to enjoy, the Barbados Sunrise is the perfect companion for lazy afternoons, beachside gatherings, or simply bringing a bit of paradise to your day.

name: Batanga
description: A vibrant and invigorating Mexican classic, the Batanga balances crisp tequila blanco with tangy lime and the bold sweetness of cola for a cocktail that is equal parts refreshing and bold. Perfect for lively gatherings or a laid-back summer evening, this long drink's fizz and zest invite you to enjoy every sip.

name: Batman
description: Sweet and tangy, the Batman #2 is a vivid non-alcoholic mocktail bursting with sunshine-orange and a hint of scarlet grenadine. Ideal for any heroic occasion, it delivers a refreshing citrus blast highlighted by a ribbon of berry-like sweetness. Perfect for kids, comic fans, or anyone seeking a lively, eye-catching, booze-free treat.

name: Bay Breeze
description: Breezy, fruity, and incredibly refreshing, the Bay Breeze is the perfect companion for sunny afternoons and beachside relaxation. This cocktail delivers vibrant tropical flavors with the tang of cranberry and the smoothness of vodka—a vacation in a glass.

name: Bella Luna
description: Bright and uplifting, the Bella Luna is a non-alcoholic escape to the tropics. Zesty lime juice, sweet pineapple, and vibrant orange juice come together in a lively, thirst-quenching blend that's perfect for sunny afternoons or any time you crave a burst of refreshing fruit flavor without alcohol.

name: Bellini
description: A famed creation from Harry's Bar in Venice, the Bellini offers vibrant peach flavors elevated by sparkling Prosecco. Light, refreshing, and perfect for celebrations or sunlit brunches, this Italian classic is as elegant as it is effervescent.

name: Bernice
description: The Bernice is a bold and aromatic cocktail that delights the senses. It combines the distinctive herbal notes of absinthe, the smoothness of vodka, and the vanilla-anise complexity of Galliano, balanced beautifully with zesty lime juice and a touch of sweetness from simple syrup. Perfect for classic cocktail lovers seeking an adventurous yet approachable drink with layers of intrigue.

name: Between the Sheets
description: A timeless classic with a lively, refreshing twist, Between the Sheets delivers refined elegance in every sip. The combination of velvety Cognac, bright Triple Sec, and crisp white rum is lifted by a burst of lemon juice, creating a perfectly balanced cocktail with a citrusy edge. Ideal for lively evenings and sophisticated celebrations, this drink offers both warmth and zest for those who appreciate depth and harmony in their glass.

name: Big Ben
description: The Big Ben is a vibrant and fruity cocktail that combines tropical and stone fruit flavors with a spirited kick. Vodka serves as the bold base, while peach liqueur and apricot brandy layer in lush sweetness. Pineapple juice, maracuja (passion fruit) nectar, and cherry nectar blend seamlessly for a tangy, exotic profile, complemented by the bright tartness of lemon juice. A touch of mango syrup ties everything together, creating a colorful and refreshing drink that's perfect for lively gatherings or summer evenings. Served in a jumbo glass, the Big Ben is both eye-catching and delicious.

name: Bitter Bull
description: Bursting with energy and citrus, the Bitter Bull is a modern highball that pairs the herbal bitterness of Campari with the grassy kick of cachaça. Fresh orange juice adds juicy brightness, while energy drink provides a lively, effervescent finish. Ideal for lively gatherings or a flavorful night out, this bold refreshment offers a zesty twist for the adventurous palate.

name: Bittered Gin Sling
description: Refreshingly complex and effervescent, the Bittered Gin Sling beautifully mingles bright citrus, herbal notes, and a subtle bitterness. This shaken gin classic is perfect for warm evenings and gatherings, delivering lively flavors with a sophisticated twist.

name: Black Manhattan
description: Bold and elegant, the Black Manhattan reimagines the classic with a modern edge. Rich Amaro delivers herbal and bittersweet undertones, while rye whiskey adds aromatic spice and warmth. Accented with fragrant dashes of Angostura and orange bitters, this cocktail delivers a layered, sophisticated experience ideal for a contemplative evening or an elevated gathering.

name: Black Russian
description: A bold mix of vodka and coffee liqueur, the Black Russian is a spirited, no-nonsense cocktail for lovers of deep, rich flavors. Renowned for its simplicity and smoothness, it's perfect for unwinding after dinner or starting an evening with a classic touch.

name: Blackthorn No. 3
description: Classic and sophisticated, the Blackthorn No. 3 is a spirit-forward cocktail that entices with herbal and bittersweet notes. Its harmonious fusion of white vermouth, robust whisky, absinthe, and aromatic bitters creates a beautifully complex and contemplative sip, perfect for an evening unwind or an elegant pre-dinner drink.

name: Blinker
description: A throwback to the prohibition era, the Blinker is a crisp and lively cocktail balancing the spice of rye whisky with tangy grapefruit juice and a dash of fruity grenadine syrup. The subtle touch of grapefruit bitters deepens the complexity, making it a refined choice for cocktail enthusiasts seeking both tartness and sweet vibrancy in every sip.

name: Blue Hawaii
description: Dive into a wave of tropical flavor with the Blue Hawaii—a vibrant, refreshing cocktail that pairs the lush sweetness of pineapple with citrusy blue curaçao and a duo of smooth spirits. Perfect for summer gatherings, beach memories, or whenever you want to bring a splash of paradise to your glass.

name: Blue Hawaiian
description: The Blue Hawaiian is a vibrant and tropical cocktail that blends the sweet tang of pineapple juice with the creamy richness of coconut cream. Rum forms the spirited base, while Blue Curaçao adds a stunning blue hue and a hint of citrus flavor. Served in a highball glass, this drink delivers a refreshing and visually striking experience that evokes the spirit of island getaways.

name: Blue Lady
description: The Blue Lady is a vibrant and eye-catching cocktail that combines the citrusy sweetness of Blue Curaçao, the refreshing fizz of lemon-lime soda, and the classic kick of white rum. Served in a cocktail bowl, this drink is both visually appealing and deliciously smooth, making it perfect for summer gatherings or lively parties. Its rich blue hue and balanced flavor make it as enjoyable to look at as it is to sip.

name: Blue Lagoon
description: The Blue Lagoon is a vibrant, refreshing cocktail combining the smoothness of vodka with the citrusy sweetness of Blue Curaçao and a splash of lemon-lime soda. Presented in a brandy glass, this drink offers a striking blue hue and a deliciously balanced flavor, making it perfect for lively gatherings or a relaxing evening.

name: Blue Monday
description: The Blue Monday is a vibrant vodka-based cocktail that blends 45 ml of smooth vodka with 15 ml of orange-flavored Cointreau and a splash of 10 ml Blue Curaçao, which gives it its striking blue color. This eye-catching drink is typically served in a cocktail bowl glass, making it a perfect choice for those who enjoy bright, refreshing, and citrusy cocktails with a hint of sweetness.

name: Boston Sour
description: A silky twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, the Boston Sour delivers vibrant citrus brightness, smooth sweetness, and a foamy layer of richness thanks to egg white. This cocktail is perfectly balanced for sophisticated evenings, impressing both whiskey lovers and those drawn to textural cocktails.

name: Bradford Martini
description: The Bradford Martini is an elegant twist on the classic martini, delivering a crisp profile of dry gin and herbal white vermouth, accented by a hint of aromatic orange bitters. This cocktail is perfect for refined occasions, offering a harmonious balance of juniper, citrus, and gentle floral notes. Experience the sophistication and exhilaration of a bar classic, reimagined for connoisseurs.

name: Brandy Alexander
description: A luxurious creamy classic, the Brandy Alexander marries the richness of brandy with the velvety sweetness of crème de cacao and fresh cream. This elegant treat is perfect as an indulgent dessert cocktail or to warm up a glitzy night out.

name: Brandy Eggnog
description: A classic holiday treat, the Brandy Eggnog combines rich creaminess with spirited warmth, making it the perfect festive sipper for cozy gatherings and chilly nights.

productionSteps.message: Sprinkle a touch of ground cinnamon as a garnish before serving.

name: Brandy Milk Punch
description: Experience cozy sophistication with the Brandy Milk Punch, a classic blend that pairs velvety milk with the refined richness of Cognac. This cocktail delivers a smooth sweetness with a subtle warming kick—perfect for leisurely brunches or as a soothing nightcap.

name: Bronx
description: A refreshing gin classic from early 20th-century New York, the Bronx cocktail offers a balanced combination of crisp gin, zesty orange, and smooth vermouths, making it perfect for a sophisticated evening or celebratory toast.

name: Brooklyn
description: A tribute to New York’s vibrant borough, the Brooklyn cocktail is a refined classic for serious cocktail enthusiasts. With spicy rye whisky, silky white vermouth, a dash of complex amaro, and a whisper of cherry, this drink is elegantly dry yet layered with unique flavors. It’s the perfect choice for evenings that call for a sophisticated twist on the Manhattan.

name: Brown Derby
description: This classy cocktail perfectly blends the rich and mellow character of bourbon with the sweet earthiness of maple syrup and the refreshing zing of pink grapefruit juice. The Brown Derby is a stylish choice for sophisticated evenings, ideal for those who enjoy a sweet-and-sour balance and a drink with depth and charm.

name: Buck’s Fizz
description: Enjoy the sparkling elegance of Buck’s Fizz—a delightful, bubbly blend of orange juice and champagne, perfect for celebrations and leisurely brunches. Its vibrant citrus notes meet smooth effervescence, making every sip light, uplifting, and irresistibly festive.

name: BVD
description: A robust and spirit-forward classic, the BVD blends rich brandy, crisp white vermouth, and aromatic Dubonnet for a smooth, reﬁned experience. Ideal for a sophisticated evening or as a show-stopping aperitif.

name: Cable Car
description: Smooth, zesty, and inviting, the Cable Car charms with its luscious froth and balanced tang. The creamy richness of egg white melds with sharp lemon and a sweet whisper of syrup, while bright orange liqueur and warming spiced rum provide depth. Enjoy this classic when you crave a cocktail that's at once elegant and casually uplifting—a true conversation opener for any gathering.

name: Café Blanco
description: A rich and invigorating blend where smooth tequila meets cold brew coffee, lifted by coffee liqueur and a shimmer of vanilla sweetness. Accented with a touch of chocolate mole bitters, this elegant drink is perfect for evenings when you crave something bold yet velvety. Sip and savor café flavors in a refined, modern cocktail experience.

name: Caipirinha
description: Experience Brazil in a glass with the Caipirinha—zesty lime and sugar muddled together to release their vibrant flavors, enhanced and mellowed by the rich character of Cachaça. Refreshing and robust, this cocktail is perfect for festive gatherings or relaxing summer evenings.

name: Caipiroska
description: A lively, modern twist on Brazil’s iconic Caipirinha, the Caipiroska swaps out cachaça for smooth vodka, delivering a crisp and invigorating drink. Each sip combines zesty lime with a pleasantly sweet touch and a cooling sensation, making it perfect for sunny afternoons and those seeking a simple, spirited refreshment.

productionSteps.message: Muddle the lime and sugar in the bottom of the rocks glass, then fill the glass with crushed ice.

name: Californian Margarita
description: A vibrant Californian spin on the classic Margarita, the Californian Margarita brings together the familiar brightness of citrus and agave with the spicy-sweet kick of Falernum. Refreshing, lightly exotic, and full of nuanced flavors, this cocktail is ideal for sunny afternoons and festive gatherings—perfect for those who enjoy a bold twist on a timeless favorite.

name: Cameron's Kick
description: A vibrant classic, Cameron's Kick melds the smoky complexity of Scotch whisky with the smooth warmth of Irish whisky. Fresh lemon juice adds brightness, while orgeat syrup brings a subtle sweet nuttiness. The result is a balanced, intriguing cocktail adored by whisky fans and newcomers alike.

name: Campari Orange
description: The Campari Orange is a classic, vibrant cocktail served in a rocks glass. This simple yet elegant drink combines 40 ml of Campari's distinctively bittersweet flavor with 160 ml of refreshing orange juice, creating a beautifully balanced beverage with a vivid sunset hue. Perfect as an aperitif or a light cocktail for any occasion, the Campari Orange offers a delightful mix of citrus and herbal notes, making it both refreshing and sophisticated.

name: Canchànchara
description: A timeless Cuban refreshment, the Canchànchara brings together gold rum, honey syrup, and zesty lime juice for a perfectly balanced, invigorating sip. This cocktail is a sweet and tart burst of sunny Cuban spirit, perfect for warm summer evenings, lively gatherings, or whenever you crave a taste of island tradition.

name: Cantaritos
description: A lively and tangy celebration in a glass, the Cantaritos combines tart pink grapefruit, zesty lime, sweet orange juice, and fizzy grapefruit soda with the warming depth of tequila. Refreshing, colorful, and bursting with citrus, this cocktail captures the energy of a Mexican fiesta in every sip and is perfect for sunny afternoons or making any gathering feel festive.

name: Cape Codder
description: Bright and crisp, the Cape Codder blends smooth vodka with tart cranberry juice and a splash of lime for an easygoing cocktail that evokes breezy coastal evenings. Served over ice, it’s as refreshing as a Cape Cod summer getaway and a simple favorite for any occasion.

name: Champagne Comme-il-faut
description: A sparkling, non-alcoholic delight, the Champagne Comme-il-faut blends the sweet vibrancy of pineapple juice, crisp white grape juice, and the gentle spice of ginger ale. Effervescent and inviting, this refreshing mocktail is perfect for joyful summer parties, daytime celebrations, or any occasion when you want festive bubbles without the booze.

name: Champagne Snowball
description: A festive indulgence, the Champagne Snowball dazzles with creamy Advocaat, tangy lime cordial, and dry sherry, all crowned by sparkling prosecco. This elegant cocktail strikes a perfect balance between richness and effervescence, making it the ideal celebratory serve for toasting life’s special moments.

productionSteps.message:
Shake the Advocaat, lime juice, and sherry with ice until well chilled, then 
continue.

name: Chapman
description: Crisp, lively, and bursting with citrus, the Chapman is the perfect non-alcoholic refresher for any warm day. Blending the smooth sweetness of orange juice with the exhilarating fizz of lemon-lime soda, this vibrant highball delivers pure satisfaction with every sip. Ideal for gatherings where refreshment takes center stage, Chapman pairs sunshine flavor with sparkling simplicity.

name: Chocolate Cherry Old Fashioned
description: Experience a decadent take on the Old Fashioned—where smooth bourbon meets the deep richness of chocolate and the sweet tang of cherry syrup. This cocktail feels like dessert in a glass, perfect for unwinding in the evening or making a special moment extra indulgent.

name: Citrus Fizz
description: A lively, sparkling non-alcoholic refreshment, the Citrus Fizz brings together zesty lime and sweet orange juice for a vibrant citrus punch. Accented with aromatic Angostura Bitters and finished with crisp tonic water, this effervescent mocktail is perfect for brunches, celebratory toasts, or any occasion where a refreshing, flavorful drink is in order.

name: Closing Argument
description: A modern classic, the Closing Argument is a bold, vibrant cocktail for those who crave adventure in a glass. Expect an intriguing interplay of smokiness from mezcal, sharp citrus from lime juice, sweet Maraschino liqueur, and a vivid herbal complexity from Green Chartreuse. It's an exhilarating, boundary-pushing drink—ideal for sipping slowly on a contemplative evening or to impress with a unique flavor journey at your next gathering.

name: Cloud 9
description: Cloud 9 is a vibrant, refreshing cocktail that blends the smoothness of vodka with the sweet, tropical notes of orange juice, pineapple juice, and banana syrup. Accented by the striking blue hue and citrus tang of Blue Curaçao, as well as the coconut warmth of Malibu, this drink is perfectly balanced with the zesty freshness of lemon and lime juice. Served in a jumbo glass, Cloud 9 is both visually stunning and delicious—a tropical escape in every sip.

name: Coconut Margarita
description: A vibrant and refreshing twist on the classic Margarita, the Coconut Margarita (less sweet) combines bold tequila with smooth coconut and citrus flavors. This cocktail is perfect for those who enjoy a less sugary yet tropical sip, making it a lively companion for summer gatherings and laid-back evenings.

name: Colombo
description: A lively fusion of zest and bitter-sweetness, the Colombo cocktail invites you to savor the fresh brightness of lime, orange, and lemon juices balanced seamlessly with Campari’s iconic bitter-orange complexity. Gomme syrup gently ties these flavors together, creating a crisp, uplifting drink perfect for summer parties or moments demanding a citrus-forward aperitivo refreshment.

name: Corn 'n' Oil
description: Experience a taste of the Caribbean with the Corn 'n' Oil, a captivating classic that layers complex rums and aromatic bitters for a bold, adventurous sip. Ideal for contemplative evenings or festive gatherings, this cocktail conjures images of sun-drenched beaches, balancing sweetness, spice, and intensity in each smooth mouthful.

name: Coronation No.1
description: Experience a refined balance of nuanced flavors in the Coronation No.1. This cocktail elegantly unites the dry, nutty notes of sherry with the crisp botanicals of white vermouth. A subtle touch of maraschino cherry sweetness and a hint of citrus-spice from orange bitters result in a delightfully mellow yet complex drink. Ideal for special occasions or anytime you crave old-world sophistication in your glass.

name: Cosmonaut
description: The Cosmonaut offers a striking twist on the familiar gin sour, pairing tart lemon juice and botanical gin with the sweet, jammy richness of raspberry preserves. Shaken cold and served in a classic cocktail glass, it's a modern, vibrant drink—perfect for adventurous evenings and those who love unexpected fruit flavors in timeless forms.

name: Cosmopolitan
description: A vibrant and refreshing classic, the Cosmopolitan blends tart cranberry and zesty lime with smooth lemon vodka and orange liqueur for a delightfully modern martini. This cocktail bursts with citrus and berry flavors—perfect for celebrations or sophisticated evenings out.

name: Cranberry Bomber
description: A lively mocktail bursting with vibrant cranberry, bright orange, and fizzy cola, the Cranberry Bomber offers a perfect balance of sweet, tart, and effervescent notes. This drink is ideal for social gatherings or sunny afternoons, bringing a splash of color and refreshment to any moment—completely alcohol-free.

name: Cuba Libre
description: A timeless highball born in Havana, the Cuba Libre is the ultimate fusion of crisp white rum, zesty lime juice, and refreshing cola. It's a spirited, effervescent drink that evokes Caribbean nights and celebratory moments. Served cold in a tall glass, it's the perfect thirst-quencher for laid-back afternoons or lively gatherings.

name: Cucumber Martini
description: A crisp, revitalizing cocktail that pairs the fresh flavor of cucumber with tangy lime and smooth vodka. This drink offers a truly refreshing sip, perfect for garden soirées or relaxing on a summer evening.

name: Cucumber Mockjito
description: A fresh and invigorating non-alcoholic rendition of the mojito, featuring cooling cucumber, zesty lime, and lively ginger beer. This mocktail is the perfect pick-me-up for hot afternoons or as a sparkling party refresher, offering a crisp and herbaceous sip that's both vibrant and satisfying.

name: Daiquiri
description: A timeless Cuban classic, the Daiquiri is a bright, zesty cocktail that balances the crisp tang of lime with the smooth heat of white rum and just a touch of sweetness. Perfect for warm evenings or whenever you crave a refreshing burst of flavor, this cocktail delivers a simple yet satisfying experience in every sip.

name: Death Flip
description: A daring modern classic, the Death Flip delivers a velvety fusion of rich creaminess and bold herbal intensity. Tequila Blanco provides the fiery backbone, while herbal liqueurs meld with a whole egg for decadent texture. This adventurous cocktail is a showstopper, ideal for those seeking a complex, unforgettable sipper.

productionSteps.message: Shake all ingredients without ice (dry shake) to emulsify the egg, then add ice and shake again until well-chilled. Strain into the glass and garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Death In The Afternoon
description: Inspired by Ernest Hemingway, Death In The Afternoon is a mysterious fusion of absinthe and sparkling wine, offering aromatic botanicals, a delicate sweetness, and lively bubbles. Elegant, complex, and slightly decadent, it's a sophisticated choice for celebrations or late-night reflection.

name: Desert Sunrise
description: The Desert Sunrise is a vibrant and refreshing cocktail that brings together the tropical sweetness of orange and pineapple juices with the smooth kick of vodka. A touch of grenadine syrup adds a beautiful sunrise effect and a hint of berry flavor, making this drink as visually stunning as it is delicious. Served in a highball glass, it's perfect for relaxing or starting off your night with a lively, fruity twist.

name: Devil's Ice Tea
description: Devil's Ice Tea is a bold and potent twist on the classic Long Island Iced Tea, perfect for those who like their cocktails with a fiery kick. This drink brings together a powerful medley of spirits—rye whisky, dark rum, tequila, dry gin, vodka, brandy, and triple sec—creating a complex, layered base. To this dynamic foundation, lime juice, lemon juice, sweet and sour mix, and a splash of cola are added, softening the intensity with bright citrus notes and a hint of sweetness. Served in a hurricane glass, Devil's Ice Tea is an electrifying choice for parties or long nights out, offering a devilishly smooth yet thrilling experience for adventurous palates.

name: Devil's Tail
description: The Devil's Tail is a vibrant and zesty cocktail that blends the tangy freshness of lime and lemon juice with the rich flavors of vodka and rum. A splash of apricot brandy adds a subtle sweetness, while grenadine syrup delivers a vivid red hue and a touch of fruity depth. Served in a cocktail bowl, this drink balances sweet, tart, and strong notes for a devilishly delightful experience.

name: Diamondback
description: A robust and sophisticated concoction, the Diamondback unites the spicy depth of rye whisky with the herbal sweetness of Yellow Chartreuse and the fruity elegance of Calvados. Served up in a cocktail glass, this classic is perfect for contemplative sipping and for those who savor the artful balance of spirit and liqueur. A drink that commands attention at the start of the evening or as a bold nightcap.

name: Dirty Martini
description: A sophisticated classic, the Dirty Martini balances the smooth bite of vodka with briny olive juice and a subtle touch of vermouth. It's a drink for cocktail aficionados, best enjoyed at a glamorous evening gathering or as a pre-dinner aperitif.

name: Division Bell
description: Savor the bold alliance of smoky mezcal and zesty lime, harmonized by the bittersweetness of Aperol and a whisper of maraschino cherry. The Division Bell strikes a perfect balance between complex and refreshing, making it a standout choice for intimate evenings or lively gatherings.

name: Dry Martini Embury's
description: A sharply classic cocktail, the Dry Martini Embury's version offers an elegant blend of bracing dry gin and whisper-soft white vermouth, elevated by a single dash of orange bitters. Its crisp, clean finish and aromatic citrus nuances make it the centerpiece of refined evenings, ideal for any occasion where sophistication takes center stage.

name: Dry Martini Fifty-Fifty
description: A perfectly poised classic, the Dry Martini Fifty-Fifty delivers equal measures of botanical gin and crisp white vermouth for a sophisticated, ultra-smooth drinking experience. Ideal for the discerning palate, it's the epitome of balance—making it the perfect aperitif for evenings that celebrate timeless style.

name: Dry Martini Franklin
description: A refined take on the iconic Martini, the Dry Martini Franklin brings together crisp dry gin with aromatic white vermouth and a subtle touch of orange bitters. Experience a refreshing clarity and enigmatic depth in every sip. Perfect for evenings that call for elegance or conversations that deserve sophistication.

name: Dry Martini Montgomery's
description: A crisp, austere twist on the classic Dry Martini, the Montgomery's style takes the delicate dance of gin, vermouth, and orange bitters to an elegant, aromatic level. Served impeccably cold, this cocktail is the embodiment of refined taste and is perfect for moments when only the finest classic will do.

name: Dry Martini Wet
description: A silky, refined take on the legendary Martini, the Dry Martini Wet elegantly melds botanical dry gin with the floral sweetness of white vermouth. A subtle dash of orange bitters imparts bright citrus and spice, rounding out the profile for a perfectly balanced, pleasantly aromatic cocktail. Best enjoyed in quiet contemplation or as a stylish aperitif to any soirée.

name: Earthquake
description: A bold and bracing creation, the Earthquake cocktail brings together the herbal intensity of absinthe, the crisp botanicals of gin, and the warmth of bourbon. Perfect for connoisseurs who enjoy robust, spirit-forward drinks that leave a lasting impression, this classic shaken cocktail is sure to make the ground beneath your feet tremble.

name: Eastern Standard
description: A vibrant, garden-fresh classic that blends cool cucumber and invigorating mint with crisp lime juice and the botanical depth of gin, gently sweetened for perfect balance. The Eastern Standard delivers a thoroughly refreshing and modern cocktail experience, ideal for stylish evenings or a sophisticated brunch.

name: Eastside Gimlet
description: Zesty, vibrant, and impossibly refreshing, the Eastside Gimlet gives a modern twist to the classic gimlet. This cocktail is a celebration of fresh botanicals, merging the crisp garden taste of cucumber with lively mint, balanced against the bite of gin and tart lime juice. Finished with a gentle sparkle from soda water, it's perfect for garden parties, warm evenings, or any time you crave an elegantly revitalizing drink.

name: El Diablo
description: El Diablo is a lively highball cocktail that delivers a perfect balance of sweet, tart, and spicy notes. Blending bold tequila with the rich blackcurrant flavor of creme de cassis, this drink is lifted by the zesty brightness of lime juice and topped off with a refreshing splash of ginger ale. Served in a highball glass, it's an invigorating drink ideal for sipping at a lively gathering or relaxing evening.

name: El Presidente
description: El Presidente is an elegant Cuban classic, offering a vibrant harmony of bright white rum, crisp vermouth, and zesty orange liqueur, artfully accented by a hint of rich grenadine syrup. Ideal for sipping during celebrations or on warm evenings, this cocktail brings a touch of vintage Havana sophistication to any occasion.

name: El Resentin
description: El Resentin is a sophisticated cocktail that fuses the bitterness of Italian amaro with the floral intensity of grappa, balanced by crisp white vermouth and a splash of cold brew coffee. Inspired by Venetian traditions and modern mixology, it's perfect for after-dinner indulgence or a late-night rendezvous, offering deep herbal complexity with an invigorating aromatic finish.

name: Elderflower Collins
description: Bright, refreshing, and elegantly floral, the Elderflower Collins brings a sophisticated spin to gin classics. Zesty lemon, delicate elderflower, and crisp gin combine with a gentle sparkle of soda, making this the perfect cocktail for leisurely afternoons or celebratory evenings. Ideal for those who enjoy a hint of sweetness and floral aroma in a chilled long drink.

name: Elderflower Spritz
description: This breezy spritz dances with zesty white wine, lush elderflower liqueur, and a burst of soda water bubbles. Bright and beautifully floral, it's your go-to for sunny afternoons, garden gatherings, or anytime you crave a sparkling, aromatic lift.

name: Enzoni
description: Experience a fresh and vibrant take on the classic Negroni with the Enzoni. This cocktail marries the herbaceous botanicals of gin and the zesty bitterness of Aperol with refreshing lemon juice and lush, muddled grapes. Balanced by a touch of simple syrup, it’s a silky, fruit-forward drink that's perfect for warm evenings or anyone seeking a sophisticated cocktail with a playful twist.

name: Espresso Galliano
description: A lively twist on the classic Irish Coffee, the Espresso Galliano highlights the smooth vanilla and herbal warmth of Galliano, balanced with the boldness of fresh hot coffee. Lemon juice adds a spark of citrus brightness, while sugar rounds everything out for a subtly sweet, richly aromatic pick-me-up. Perfect for brunch or as a comforting evening treat, this cocktail delivers a uniquely Italian sophistication with every sip.

name: Espresso Martini
description: Experience a rich fusion of bold coffee and smooth spirits in this contemporary classic. The Espresso Martini is a favorite for after-dinner moments or stylish celebrations, delivering a punch of energy with a silky, frothy finish.

name: Fat Tire
description: The Fat Tire brings together the lush, sunny sweetness of orange and pineapple juices with the bold complexity of Jamaican rum and herbal Amaro. This cocktail offers a vibrant journey of tropical fruit balanced by bittersweet sophistication, making it perfect for lively gatherings or an elegant, relaxing evening. Its rich and exotic flavor profile delivers both refreshment and depth in every sip.

name: Faux Kir
description: Enjoy the Faux Kir, a bright and sophisticated mocktail inspired by the French classic. Lush raspberry syrup and refreshing grape juice combine for an elegant, non-alcoholic drink that's ideal for any festive occasion or classy evening. Delicate, fruity, and wonderfully balanced, it’s a delightful sipper in a wine glass.

name: Fitzgerald
description: A modern classic created by Dale DeGroff, the Fitzgerald is a bright and invigorating gin sour with a subtle aromatic complexity. Its balance of tart lemon juice and sweet syrup, with a signature dash of bitters, makes it perfect for lively gatherings or unwinding after a long day.

name: Flirtini
description: Effervescent and playful, the Flirtini is a sparkling blend of vodka, pineapple juice, and crisp prosecco. Perfect for celebrations or glamorous evenings, this cocktail delights with its balance of citrusy fruit and lively bubbles.

name: Flying Grasshopper
description: The Flying Grasshopper is a creamy, minty delight that elegantly elevates the classic Grasshopper with the smooth addition of vodka. Cool and invigorating, this cocktail is perfect for those who crave a decadent dessert drink that balances velvety cream with the refreshing essence of mint and chocolate. Ideal for after-dinner sipping or special gatherings where you want to serve up something sophisticated and satisfying.

name: Ford
description: A staple of classic cocktail culture, the Ford highlights the complex botanicals of gin in perfect harmony with herbal DOM Benedictine and crisp white vermouth. Its splash of orange bitters adds a subtle citrus lift, making it a refined and balanced sip, ideal for slow enjoyment on sophisticated evenings or celebrations with a vintage flair.

name: Frankie
description: A vibrant, non-alcoholic cocktail that bursts with juicy pineapple and sweet citrus flavors, the Frankie is a tropical escape in a glass. Finished with a fresh strawberry note and a lively touch of lime, it’s the perfect refresher for warm afternoons or festive gatherings. Enjoy a delightful taste of summer with every sip.

name: French 76
description: This sparkling cocktail combines smooth vodka, zesty lemon juice, and a splash of sweetness, topped with lively prosecco for a festive, crisp finish. The French 76 is a sophisticated choice for celebrations and elegant evenings alike.

name: Fruit Blast
description: A lively, tropical mocktail designed for hot days and relaxed evenings. Fruit Blast delivers a harmonious blend of sweet pineapple and zesty citrus flavors, bringing a juicy freshness in every sip. Served ice-cold in a cocktail glass, this alcohol-free drink is perfect for anyone seeking a burst of fruit flavor without the spirits.

name: Garibaldi
description: Experience the Garibaldi—a lively fusion of bittersweet Aperol and fresh, vibrant orange juice, with just a kiss of simple syrup for balance. This refreshingly modern aperitivo features a light and airy texture, making it perfect for sunlit brunches, lively gatherings, or whenever you crave an uplifting, citrus-forward treat. Its signature orange hue and delicate blend of herbal, tangy, and sweet flavors deliver both sophistication and approachability in every sip.

name: Gibson
description: A timeless twist on the classic Martini, the Gibson offers a crisp, clean flavor profile thanks to its balanced pairing of gin and dry white vermouth. Finished with a distinctive pickled onion garnish, this cocktail is perfect for those seeking an elegant sip that bridges tradition with gentle savoriness. Ideal for sophisticated evenings and lovers of refined, minimal cocktails.

name: Gibson Dry Martini
description: Experience timeless elegance with the Gibson Dry Martini—a flawlessly balanced classic cocktail. Its union of dry gin and white vermouth delivers an aromatic, crisp, and sophisticated sip, ideal for memorable evenings and special occasions.

name: Gimlet
description: The Gimlet is a crisp and zesty cocktail that perfectly balances tart lime juice with the botanicals of gin and the subtle sweetness of syrup. Ideal for warm evenings, this classic is both invigorating and elegant—a refreshing companion for savoring the golden age of cocktails.

name: Gin
description: This classic gin cocktail offers a crisp and timeless flavor, balancing aromatic botanicals from gin with subtle sweetness and citrus notes. Perfect for quiet evenings and celebrations alike, it provides a smooth, spirited sip for those who appreciate the historical elegance of refined drinks.

name: Gin & It
description: Discover a timeless tipple with the Gin & It—a harmonious marriage of crisp, juniper-forward gin and lush, herbaceous red vermouth, brightened by a subtle hint of orange bitters. This pre-Prohibition classic invites you to savor its botanicals, perfect for contemplative evenings or sophisticated gatherings. Whether served neat or over a large rock, it delivers a perfectly balanced and complex sip.

name: Gin & Juice
description: The Gin & Juice is a refreshingly simple cocktail that combines 40 ml of crisp gin with 160 ml of sweet pineapple juice. Served in a stylish coupe glass, this drink offers a perfect balance of botanical notes and tropical fruit. Ideal for a relaxing evening or a casual get-together, it is a straightforward yet flavorful concoction highlighting gin's character against a backdrop of smooth, juicy pineapple.

name: Gin and Tonic
description: Effortlessly refreshing, the Gin And Tonic delivers a harmonious balance of botanicals and lively fizz. Perfect for sunlit afternoons or elegant evenings, this classic favorite lets gin's herbal notes dance with the crisp bite of tonic water. Serve over ice for a timeless thirst-quencher.

name: Gin Fizz
description: A lively and invigorating cocktail, the Gin Fizz boasts a perfect balance of crisp gin, tangy citrus, and effervescent soda water. Exceptionally refreshing, this drink is an ideal companion for sunny afternoons or lively gatherings, offering a zesty kick and a delightfully smooth finish with every sip.

name: Gin Sour
description: A tangy and refreshing classic, the Gin Sour blends crisp gin with zesty lemon and a touch of sweetness, topped off by silky egg white foam and a hint of aromatic bitters. Perfect for elegant evenings and those who appreciate a well-balanced, sophisticated cocktail.

name: Gin Tai
description: The Gin Tai is a vibrant, tropical cocktail that puts a refreshing twist on classic tiki flavors. This drink features a bold base of gin, complemented by the tartness of lime juice and the rich, fruity notes of apricot brandy. Almond syrup adds a sweet, nutty depth, while a splash of pineapple juice highlights the drink's exotic character. Typically served in a hurricane glass, the Gin Tai is both zesty and complex, making it a perfect choice for anyone looking to enjoy a refreshing yet sophisticated cocktail.

name: Godfather
description: Smooth, sophisticated, and effortlessly classic, the Godfather cocktail pairs the sweetness of amaretto with the deep, warming character of whisky. Sip slowly to enjoy this elegant, almond-tinged union—the perfect drink to end a long day or accompany a contemplative moment.

name: Golden Cadillac
description: A silky, indulgent blend for lovers of creamy classics, the Golden Cadillac charms with a hint of vanilla, sweet chocolate, and luscious cream. Elegant and smooth, it’s perfect for a celebratory evening or as a decadent dessert cocktail.

name: Golden Dream
description: Experience the radiant fusion of fresh orange and creamy vanilla in the Golden Dream. This luxurious cocktail balances Galliano's herbal sweetness with zesty Triple Sec, tangy orange juice, and rich cream, creating a silky smooth texture perfect for unwinding or celebrating golden moments.

name: Grasshopper
description: Indulge in the retro charm of the Grasshopper—a smooth, minty classic that delivers sweet, creamy refreshment with every sip. Perfect for a sophisticated after-dinner treat or a playful nightcap, its vibrant green hue and silky texture make it as visually appealing as it is delicious. Enjoy a hint of nostalgia with this decadent blend of chocolate and mint flavors.

name: Grog
description: A robust and time-honored cocktail inspired by centuries-old naval tradition. Grog blends overproof rum's intense spirit with the tang of lime juice, the softening touch of water, gentle sweetness from simple syrup, and the spicy complexity of Angostura Bitters. Perfect for those seeking a revitalizing drink that delivers both strength and refreshment in a single glass.

name: Gunner
description: Effervescent and zesty, the Gunner combines refreshing ginger flavors with a hint of lime and a touch of aromatic bitters. It’s the ideal highball for those seeking a non-alcoholic sipper—perfect for sun-drenched patios or lively get-togethers.

name: Gypsy Queen
description: A refined, spirit-forward cocktail where vodka’s crisp purity intertwines with the herbal, honeyed complexity of DOM Benedictine. A dash of Angostura Bitters imparts a subtle spice, rounding out the drink’s silky texture. Perfect for moments when you crave a contemplative, elegant sip—ideally enjoyed in the evening or at a stylish gathering.

name: Harvard
description: A timeless classic, the Harvard cocktail offers a luxurious harmony of Cognac and red vermouth, lightly brightened with soda water and a trace of silky sweetness from gomme syrup. The bitters provide refined complexity while the effervescent finish makes it perfect for an evening of sophisticated relaxation.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
description: The Harvey Wallbanger delivers a sunshine-bright blend of orange juice and vodka, finished with a smooth vanilla-herbal float of Galliano. Legendary for its easygoing, vibrant character, this classic cocktail is a perfect companion for brunches, sunset gatherings, and retro celebrations.

name: Hemingway Special
description: This iconic cocktail delivers a crisp, tart experience, blending the punch of white rum with lively citrus and a subtle cherry finish. Inspired by Ernest Hemingway’s unique palate, the Hemingway Special is perfect for adventurers who crave refreshment with a refined edge. Its dazzling complexity makes it a sophisticated companion for summer evenings or literary contemplation.

name: Horse's Neck
description: Enjoy a refreshing balance of bourbon's warmth and ginger ale's effervescence in this timeless classic. A hint of aromatic bitters rounds out the experience, making it a perfect choice for relaxed evenings or spirited gatherings. The Horse's Neck delivers a lively yet elegant twist on the highball tradition.

name: Hotel Nacional Special
description: A legendary Cuban cocktail that captures the essence of tropical elegance. The Hotel Nacional Special brings together gold rum, smooth apricot brandy, fresh lime, luscious pineapple juice, sugar syrup, and a dash of bitters to deliver a lively, refreshing drink that radiates sun-drenched vibrancy. Perfect for warm evenings, celebrations, or when you crave a historical classic with a tropical twist.

name: Hunter
description: A timeless classic, the Hunter cocktail elegantly marries the robust, warming flavor of bourbon with the luscious sweetness of cherry liqueur. Hints of maraschino and a touch of orange bitters create a deep, complex harmony that delights spirit lovers and classic cocktail fans alike. Best enjoyed on a cool evening when you want a perfect balance between boldness and smooth nuance.

name: Hurricane
description: The Hurricane is a vibrant and fruity cocktail that's sure to liven up any gathering. This drink combines tropical flavors with a spirited kick, blending 70ml each of orange and pineapple juice for a juicy base. It features a mix of 30ml Jamaican rum—with an extra 10ml added for depth—and 20ml of bold overproof rum, resulting in a potent and flavorful mix. Apricot brandy adds a whisper of fruity sweetness, while 20ml each of lemon and lime juice bring fresh, citrusy brightness. A touch of grenadine syrup delivers a hint of color and sweetness. Served in a jumbo glass, the Hurricane is the ultimate rum-lovers' cocktail, striking a delightful balance between sweet, tart, and strong.

name: Hurricane Suzy
description: Experience the vibrant spirit of the Caribbean with the Hurricane Suzy, a dazzling cocktail filled with tropical fruit flavors and a bold double-rum punch. Shaken with citrus and passion fruit, this colorful drink delivers a refreshing, sweet-tart complexity perfect for festive occasions or summer nights.

name: Impatient Virgin
description: Indulgence meets elegance in the Impatient Virgin—a creamy, luxurious cocktail designed for those who desire a sweet escape. Vodka’s crispness acts as the base for a heavenly marriage of hazelnut from Frangelico, chocolate from Creme De Cacao, and the lush, velvety body of fresh cream. This cocktail is perfect for unwinding after dinner or celebrating intimate moments with a decadent treat.

name: Jack Rose
description: A classic cocktail with a lively blend of fresh citrus, tangy orchard fruit, and subtle red berry. The Jack Rose features Calvados, a prized French apple brandy, balanced with lemon and lime juices for brightness, sweetened by simple syrup, raspberry syrup, and a splash of grenadine. Its vibrant color and refreshing tart-sweet flavor make it a favorite for celebratory toasts or a sophisticated evening tipple.

name: Jack's Godfather Highball
description: A playful twist on a classic, Jack's Godfather Highball marries the smoky intensity of whisky with the sweet almond warmth of amaretto, all brightened by a splash of refreshing cola. Ideal for unwinding after a long day, this effervescent highball is both invigorating and satisfyingly smooth, making it a delightful pick for fans of modernized classics.

name: Jamaican Mule
description: A vibrant take on the Moscow Mule, the Jamaican Mule blends bold spiced rum with the zesty brightness of lime juice and the spicy fizz of ginger beer. Perfect for warm evenings or tropical get-togethers, this cocktail delivers a lively balance of warmth, citrus, and effervescence with every sip.

name: Japanese Slipper
description: Refreshing and vivid, the Japanese Slipper brings together the sweet vibrancy of melon liqueur, citrusy brightness from lemon juice, and a smooth orange note from triple sec. This cocktail is a lively sipper, perfect for pre-dinner moments or whenever you're craving a taste of creative Japanese-inspired elegance.

name: Jet Pilot
description: Prepare for a wild flavor flight with the Jet Pilot—a tiki classic designed to launch your senses to a tropical escape. Potent rums ignite with a spicy kick of Angostura bitters and aromatic absinthe. Falernum, lime, and pink grapefruit juice create a heady citrus swirl, while a trace of simple syrup smooths the journey. This cocktail is perfect for evenings when adventure beckons, delivering both heat and sweet in a glass.

name: Jogger
description: Refreshingly simple and invigorating, the Jogger is a non-alcoholic classic perfect for those looking for a zesty, thirst-quenching drink. Tart lime juice is elevated by a lively stream of sparkling soda water, making it a crisp and guilt-free companion for sunny days or post-workout relaxation.

name: Kamikaze
description: The Kamikaze is a lively and refreshing cocktail that combines the crisp bite of vodka with the citrusy flavors of lime and lemon juice, balanced by the sweet orange notes of Triple Sec. Served in a rocks glass, this drink offers a perfect harmony of tangy and sweet, making it a favorite for those who appreciate a zesty, invigorating cocktail. Ideal for any occasion, the Kamikaze is both bold and smooth, delivering a vibrant burst of flavor in every sip.

name: Keep Sober
description: A vibrant and refreshing non-alcoholic cocktail created for those who want to savor a lively, sophisticated drink without the buzz. The perfect companion for any celebration or a relaxing afternoon, it balances the tart sweetness of grenadine syrup, zesty lemon syrup, and the effervescent bitterness of tonic water. Crisp, colorful, and uplifting — enjoy the moment, stay sharp, and keep sober.

name: Kew Punch
description: The Kew Punch is a lively concoction balancing crisp vodka, botanical gin, and the sweet allure of cherry brandy, all smoothed over with rich vermouth and brightened with orange liqueur. Topped with ginger ale and lemonade, it bursts with sparkling refreshment, making it perfect for summer gatherings or any occasion that calls for effervescence and crowd-pleasing complexity.

name: Key West Cooler
description: The Key West Cooler is a vibrant and tropical cocktail served in a hurricane glass, perfect for a laid-back afternoon or a sunny gathering. This flavorful drink combines fresh orange juice and tart cranberry nectar with a spirited mix of vodka, Malibu, melon liqueur, and peach liqueur. The result is a colorful, fruity refreshment that's both smooth and lively, offering delicious layers of citrus, berry, and tropical sweetness, backed by a gentle kick of spirits. Ideal for those who crave a refreshing, indulgent cooler inspired by island vibes.

name: Kir Royale
description: A luxurious sparkling cocktail beloved for its vibrant berry hue and celebratory character. The Kir Royale pairs blackcurrant liqueur with lively bubbles, making it a favored choice for festive toasts and special moments.

name: La Louisiane
description: La Louisiane brings together the ornate flavors and sultry atmosphere of New Orleans in a single glass. The peppery bite of rye melds seamlessly with vermouth’s botanical undertones and Benedictine’s rich, herbal character, all crowned by anise notes and a whisper of bitters. This sophisticated, spirited classic is perfect for contemplative evenings or lively gatherings where history and complexity matter as much as flavor.

name: Lady Killer
description: The Lady Killer is a vibrant and tropical cocktail that seamlessly blends the boldness of gin with fruity and exotic notes. Served in a hurricane glass, this drink combines 70 ml each of pineapple juice and maracuja nectar, delivering a sweet yet tangy foundation. A splash of triple sec and peach liqueur adds citrusy and stone fruit depth, while 30 ml of gin provides its sophisticated botanicals. Perfect for a refreshing escape, the Lady Killer is as alluring in taste as it is in name.

name: Last Word
description: An icon of the Prohibition era revived for modern palates, the Last Word cocktail delights with its radiant green hue and a symphony of botanicals. Revel in a harmonious blend—zesty lime juice, vibrant Green Chartreuse, nutty-sweet Maraschino liqueur, and a crisp shot of dry gin. This is the drink for evenings defined by sophistication and lively conversation.

name: Left Bank Martini
description: A refined, modern twist on the classic martini, the Left Bank Martini harmoniously blends floral elderflower liqueur with crisp dry gin, white vermouth, and a splash of white wine. This cocktail is a celebration of elegance, balancing complexity and refreshment. Perfect for sophisticated evenings and special occasions where you crave an exquisite, invigorating sip.

name: Left Hand
description: Discover a modern classic with the Left Hand—a cocktail that artfully balances bourbon’s smooth richness with bittersweet Aperol and the herbal, sophisticated roundness of red vermouth. The addition of chocolate bitters gives this drink a decadent twist, making it perfect for evenings when you crave something complex, elegant, and a little bit unexpected.

name: Lemon Daiquiri
description: Bright and zesty, the Lemon Daiquiri refreshes the palate with bold lemon juice, the smooth sweetness of simple syrup, and a subtle orange undertone from Cointreau. Built on the crisp base of white rum, this classic shaken cocktail is ideal for lively gatherings or a summer evening treat.

productionSteps.message: Wipe the rim of a chilled cocktail glass with a lemon wedge and dip into sugar to rim the glass.

name: Lemon Lime And Bitters
description: A crisp and invigorating non-alcoholic classic, Lemon Lime And Bitters offers the perfect marriage of zesty lime, sweet lemonade, and the unique spice of aromatic bitters. Popular across Australia, this sparkling highball is ideal for sunny afternoons and any time you want a sophisticated, alcohol-free refreshment.

name: Limoncello Spritz
description: The Limoncello Spritz is a refreshing cocktail that brings Italian sunshine to your glass. Crisp Prosecco mingles with zesty lemon liqueur and a splash of soda water, resulting in a light, bubbly drink that's perfect for warm afternoons or celebratory toasts. Its vibrant citrusy taste and delicate effervescence make it an ideal choice for those who love a balance of sweet and tart flavors.

name: Little Prince
description: An invigorating non-alcoholic delight, the Little Prince blends zesty lemon juice with velvety apricot juice for a bright, refreshing experience. Perfect for warm afternoons or as a sophisticated mocktail option, it dazzles with its crisp citrus notes and mellow fruit finish.

name: London Calling
description: London Calling is a masterful cocktail that offers a bright and refined celebration of London's cocktail culture. With crisp dry gin and nuanced dry sherry meeting citrusy lemon and a subtle sweetness, each sip is both stimulating and perfectly balanced. The dash of orange bitters brings it all together, making this cocktail ideal for classy evenings or whenever you want to enjoy a modern classic in a timeless way.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
description: A legendary party cocktail, the Long Island Iced Tea delivers a powerful punch in a deceptively smooth and citrusy drink. An iconic highball that blends vodka, gin, rum, tequila, and Cointreau with lemon and simple syrup before topping with cola for a refreshing, effervescent finish. Perfect for celebrations and nights out, it's a social favorite with a complex character.

name: Lynchburg Lemonade
description: The Lynchburg Lemonade is a vibrant and refreshing whisky cocktail that combines the smoothness of Jack Daniel's whiskey with the sweet tang of lemonade, fresh lemon, and lime juices. A splash of triple sec adds a hint of citrus complexity, making this drink perfect for a hot day. Traditionally served in a highball glass, it's a zesty and invigorating choice for fans of whisky-based cocktails.

name: M & M
description: The M & M cocktail blends Italian herbal Amaro with smoky Mezcal, resulting in a layered, spirit-forward drink with both bitterness and intrigue. Ideal for slow sipping and contemplative evenings, it’s a conversation piece for lovers of bold flavors and modern classics.

name: Mai Tai
description: Experience a tropical escape with the Mai Tai, a legendary cocktail bursting with citrus and almond flavors, perfectly balanced by the warmth of dual rums. This iconic drink is your ticket to sunshine, evoking vibrant beachside evenings and the carefree spirit of tiki adventures.

name: Maldives
description: The Maldives cocktail is a vibrant and refreshing drink that combines the rich, smoky notes of bourbon with the bittersweet, citrusy flavors of Aperol and fresh juices. Orange juice and lemon juice add a burst of fruity brightness, while a touch of simple syrup brings everything together with a subtle sweetness. Served in a hurricane glass, this enticing whisky-based cocktail delivers a well-balanced mix of bold and tangy flavors, perfect for relaxing and unwinding.

name: Man O' War
description: Inspired by its legendary racehorse namesake, the Man O' War delivers bold bourbon flavor complemented by the citrusy brightness of triple sec and lemon juice, mellowed perfectly with sweet red vermouth and a hint of simple syrup. Ideal for savoring on a classy evening or impressing guests with its timeless character.

name: Mango Basil Margarita
description: A summery, tropical spin on the Margarita, the Mango Basil Margarita melds sweet mango liqueur with earthy basil and tangy lime. Balanced by smooth tequila and a touch of agave, this cocktail is lively, aromatic, and perfect for relaxing afternoons or lively get-togethers.

name: Mango Martini
description: A dazzling escape to the tropics in a glass, the Mango Martini swirls together succulent mango puree, crisp white rum, and a touch of citrus to create a perfectly balanced, sun-kissed cocktail. Bright, smooth, and utterly refreshing, this martini is ideal for lively summer evenings or whenever you crave a taste of paradise.

name: Mango Rum Punch
description: Juicy, sun-soaked mangoes meet a double hit of rum in this energetic tropical punch. Layers of rich fruitiness blend with overproof rum’s heat and depth, softened by mango liqueur, bright lime juice, and aromatic bitters. Perfect for sipping poolside or evoking island vibes at any festive gathering.

name: Manhattan
description: An iconic classic, the Manhattan brings together the warming richness of bourbon and rye whisky with the herbal depth of red vermouth and a dash of Angostura bitters. It's a flawlessly balanced cocktail—smooth, bold, and beloved as the sophisticated centerpiece of any refined gathering or elegant night in.

name: Manhattan Dry
description: Savor a refined twist on a legendary favorite with the Manhattan Dry. This cocktail melds the robust warmth of bourbon with the crisp, herbal brightness of white vermouth, all lifted by the aromatic dash of Angostura bitters. Stirred to silky perfection, it promises a timeless, sophisticated experience—ideal for elegant gatherings or evening unwinding.

name: Manhattan Sweet
description: A timeless blend of smooth bourbon, sweet red vermouth, and aromatic bitters, the Manhattan Sweet offers a refined and satisfying sipping experience. Perfect for elegant evenings or celebrating life’s finest moments, this cocktail brings warmth and subtle complexity to any occasion.

name: Margarita
description: A classic Mexican-inspired cocktail, the Margarita offers a refreshing and vibrant flavor profile. The crisp bite of Tequila Blanco harmonizes with the sweet orange notes of Triple Sec and the tangy flash of lime juice, rounded off by a touch of salt on the rim. Perfect for lively gatherings or relaxing under the sun.

productionSteps.message: Rim the edge of the cocktail glass with salt by rubbing lime juice on the rim and dipping it into salt.
Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into the prepared glass.

name: Margarita on-the-rocks
description: A vibrant twist on the beloved classic, the Margarita on-the-rocks showcases the golden warmth of Tequila Reposado, elegantly layered with the natural sweetness of agave syrup and a punch of lime juice. This lively cocktail finishes with citrusy Triple Sec and a hint of Margarita Bitters, delivering refreshment with every sip. Perfect for relaxed afternoons, festive gatherings, or simply as a zesty treat to wind down the day.

name: Martinez
description: An iconic cocktail with origins tracing back to the late 1800s, the Martinez combines the botanicals of gin with the rich sweetness of vermouth and a touch of Maraschino cherry liqueur. Rounded off with orange bitters, it's a complex, aromatic drink perfect for slow sipping on a sophisticated evening.

name: Martini Perfect
description: A timeless blend for the sophisticated palate, the Martini Perfect pairs the crisp character of gin with equal measures of red and white vermouth, finished with a dash of Angostura Bitters. Designed for those who savor balance and elegance, this cocktail is perfect for both glamorous evenings and contemplative moments.

name: Mary Pickford
description: A dazzling fusion of tropical sweetness and subtle cherry notes, the Mary Pickford is a timeless classic that captures the spirit of Hollywood’s golden era. Crisp white rum mingles with juicy pineapple, while grenadine and maraschino cherry juice add a playful blush and a kiss of candied fruit, delivering a cocktail as glamorous as its namesake. Perfect for celebrations or a classic night in.

name: Metropole
description: A classic cocktail that showcases the refined character of Cognac melded with herbal white vermouth and the intrigue of dual bitters. The Metropole delivers an elegant and balanced sipping experience, perfect for contemplative evenings or impressing guests with its historical roots and complex, yet harmonious, flavors.

name: Mexican Colada
description: The Mexican Colada is a tropical twist on the classic piña colada, perfect for fans of creamy, flavorful cocktails with a kick. This luscious drink blends 80 ml of vibrant pineapple juice with 20 ml each of coconut syrup and cream for a silky, rich base. A splash of 30 ml Tequila Blanco elevates the drink with signature Mexican flair, while 20 ml of Kahlúa adds a subtle coffee richness, resulting in a uniquely balanced, indulgent treat. Served traditionally in a hurricane glass, the Mexican Colada is a ready-to-enjoy, tequila-forward cocktail ideal for relaxing moments or festive gatherings.

name: Mexican Margarita
description: A timeless tequila classic born in Mexico, the Mexican Margarita invigorates with a bold fusion of tangy lime, velvety orange liqueur, and the earthy punch of agave spirit. Frozen and refreshingly tart, this cocktail perfectly balances citrus and sweetness for sun-soaked parties or vibrant celebrations, with a salted rim inviting you to sip and savor each zesty moment.

productionSteps.message: Moisten the rim of a chilled cocktail glass with lime juice and roll it in salt.

name: Mexican Mule
description: The Mexican Mule delivers a bold twist on the Moscow Mule, swapping vodka for smooth tequila reposado. Bright citrus pairs perfectly with a gentle sweetness and the unmistakable spicy fizz of ginger beer. A chill, invigorating cocktail that’s ideal for lively gatherings or warm evenings.

name: Mezcal Margarita
description: A smoky reinvention of the iconic Margarita, this Mezcal Margarita is the perfect fusion of bold, earthy mezcal and vibrant citrus. The depth of mezcal comes alive against crisp lime juice, balanced sweetness from triple sec and agave syrup, and a savory touch of saline. Experience a cocktail that’s both adventurous and refreshing, offering a contemporary twist on a classic for lively gatherings or sunset sipping.

productionSteps.message: Optionally add 1 drop of bitters such as Margarita Bitters before serving for extra complexity.

name: Michelada
description: A lively fusion of spice and refreshment, the Michelada is perfect for hot, sunny days and festive gatherings. This Mexican beer cocktail invigorates with tangy lime, savory sauces, and a fiery kick of Tabasco, resulting in a thirst-quenching, boldly flavored drink that transforms lager into a festive treat. Ideal as a flavorful companion at barbecues or as a revitalizing pick-me-up, the Michelada is a celebration of zest and spice in every sip.

name: Midnight Stinger
description: Bold, herbal, and invigorating, the Midnight Stinger is a modern classic blending rich bourbon with the bittersweet depth of amaro. The crisp lemon juice enlivens every sip, while simple syrup brings just the right sweetness. Served over crushed ice, it's the perfect late-night refreshment for those who crave both complexity and refreshment in their glass.

name: Milano Torino
description: Evoking the vibrant spirit of Italy, the Milano Torino elegantly weaves the bittersweet zest of Aperol with the herbal, aromatic charm of red vermouth. This classic sipper is refreshingly light but layered, perfect for lingering evenings or aperitivo hour, inviting you to savor tradition with every sip.

name: Mimosa
description: A refreshing and elegant brunch cocktail, the Mimosa seamlessly blends the bright citrus flavor of orange juice with the lively fizziness of Prosecco for a light, festive experience. Perfect for celebratory occasions or leisurely mornings.

name: Mine
description: Bright and inviting, the Mine cocktail layers crisp apple juice with juicy grape and zesty grapefruit for a thirst-quenching, alcohol-free refreshment. Vibrant and tangy, it's the ideal choice for those seeking a delicious mocktail bursting with fruit flavor—perfect for gatherings or relaxed afternoons.

name: Mint Julep
description: A refreshing Southern classic, the Mint Julep dazzles with cool mint leaves and smooth bourbon, served over a mountain of crushed ice. Perfect for warm afternoons, this iconic cocktail delivers a balance of herbal and sweet notes, creating a spirited experience that evokes the lively energy of summer gatherings and the tradition of Kentucky derbies.

name: Miss Ruby
description: Bright, vibrant, and full of energy, the Miss Ruby dazzles with a balance of smooth vodka, zesty orange liqueur, and tart pomegranate. Shaken until perfectly chilled, this crisp cocktail is the star of any celebration or evening out, offering a refreshing twist and an elegant pour for those who appreciate a hint of fruit with their sophistication.

name: Missionary's Downfall
description: An invigorating blend of tropical fruit and fresh herbs, the Missionary's Downfall delivers vibrant pineapple and crisp lime elevated by cooling mint and smooth honey. This cocktail is perfect for sunny afternoons when you crave a balance of sweetness, tang, and refreshing herbal flavor. A timeless classic that transports you to a breezy paradise with every sip.

name: Mizuwari
description: Embodying the spirit of Japanese minimalism, the Mizuwari is a refined cocktail that allows the depth of whisky to open up with pure, cool water. This refreshingly simple classic is ideal for contemplative sipping, making it the perfect companion for relaxed evenings or moments of quiet celebration.

name: Mojito
description: A refreshing Cuban classic, the Mojito brings together crisp lime juice, vibrant mint, and robust white rum. Its lively balance of sweet, tart, and herbal flavors makes it perfect for warm days and energetic nights alike.

name: Mojito Mocktail
description: Enjoy this invigorating take on the beloved Mojito without the alcohol – a perfect choice for warm days or lively gatherings. Vibrant lime juice and fragrant mint leaves, lightly sweetened and finished with a lively fizz of soda water, come together for a crisp, uplifting refreshment.

name: Monkey Gland
description: Step into the decadence of the Jazz Age with the Monkey Gland—a dazzling cocktail where botanical gin mingles with zesty orange juice, enriched by the whisper of absinthe and a subtle touch of fruity sweetness. This drink delivers a refreshing, tangy profile with herbal complexity, ideal for lively evenings or an elevated brunch moment.

name: Monte Carlo
description: The Monte Carlo is a spirit-forward classic for the discerning palate. Smooth rye whisky provides a spicy backbone, while DOM Benedictine adds layers of herbal sweetness. A dash of aromatic bitters enhances the complexity, creating an elegantly balanced cocktail perfect for slow sipping, special gatherings, or a contemplative evening at home.

name: MonteNegroni
description: The MonteNegroni reinvents the timeless Negroni by adding a layer of sophisticated bitterness with amaro, beautifully intertwining herbal, sweet, and botanical notes into every sip. It's the perfect cocktail for those who enjoy an elevated twist on a classic, ideal for elegant evenings and special celebrations.

name: Morning Glory Fizz
description: A lively and sophisticated brunch classic, the Morning Glory Fizz awakens the senses with the bold warmth of whisky, the bright tang of lemon and lime, and a whisper of absinthe for intrigue. Soft creamy texture from egg white and a spirited fizz from soda water make it a refreshing way to start your day or elevate a late-morning gathering.

name: Moscow Mule
description: Revitalize your senses with the iconic Moscow Mule—a crisp blend of vodka, tangy lime juice, and spicy ginger beer. Served over ice, it's the ultimate refresher for warm evenings, lively gatherings, or when you need a zesty pick-me-up.

name: Moët Margarita
description: A sparkling twist on the classic Margarita, the Moët Margarita delivers zesty lime and tequila flavors seamlessly balanced with the sweetness of orange liqueur and simple syrup, all crowned by a generous pour of prosecco. Effervescent and refined, it's the perfect cocktail for celebrations or whenever you want to elevate your night with a touch of luxury.

productionSteps.message: Moisten the rim of a cocktail glass and roll it in salt.

name: Mucho Grande
description: A vibrant and complex cocktail, the Mucho Grande harmonizes the zesty brightness of orange and lemon juices with the sweet richness of caramel syrup, all accented by Aperol and Tequila Blanco.
