This energetic mix delivers layers of citrus and bitter-sweetness, balanced with a smooth creamy texture. Ideal for lively evenings and adventurous palates.

name: Mulata Daiquiri
description: A sensual play on the classic Daiquiri, the Mulata Daiquiri offers a vibrant marriage of crisp white rum, tart lime, and velvety sweetness from creme de cacao and coffee liqueur. Elegant and smooth, a lively hint of chocolate and coffee lingers on the palate, making it a perfect cocktail for late-night celebrations and classy evenings alike.

name: Naked & Famous
description: Smoky mezcal merges brilliantly with the bitter-sweetness of Aperol and the herbal, honeyed magic of Yellow Chartreuse—all brightened with a squeeze of fresh lime juice. Vibrant and daring, this cocktail delivers an adventurous flavor journey, perfect for lively evenings or impressing friends who love creative classics.

name: Negroni
description: An Italian classic, the Negroni boasts perfect balance between bitter and sweet, combining gin, Campari, and red vermouth for a refreshingly bold cocktail ideal for leisurely evenings and refined gatherings.

name: Negroni Sbagliato
description: Effervescent and enticing, the Negroni Sbagliato offers a playful twist on the beloved Negroni by substituting gin with sparkling Prosecco. This Italian creation delivers a balanced blend of sweet red vermouth and vibrant Aperol, finished with a lively burst of bubbles. Light yet complex, it's perfect for celebrations, aperitivo hours, or anytime you crave an uplifting bitter-sweet experience.

name: New York Sour
description: A sophisticated twist on the classic Whiskey Sour, the New York Sour brings together robust bourbon, zesty lemon juice, and a dash of sweetness from simple syrup. Finished with a float of red wine, it delights with its beautiful layered appearance and a blend of fruity, citrusy, and rich oaky flavors. Perfect for evenings where elegance and depth are called for.

name: Nutty Colada
description: The Nutty Colada is a tropical-inspired cocktail that combines the sweetness of pineapple juice, the nutty depth of amaretto, creamy coconut syrup, and smooth cream. Served in a hurricane glass, this drink offers a luscious blend of flavors, evoking the classic piña colada with a rich almond twist. It's a creamy, tropical treat perfect for relaxing or entertaining.

name: Oaxaca Old-Fashioned
description: A modern riff on the classic Old-Fashioned, the Oaxaca Old-Fashioned showcases the smoky earthiness of mezcal balanced by the smooth and mellow character of tequila. Agave syrup delivers a gentle sweetness while chocolate bitters lend subtle depth, creating a bold, complex, and elegant sipper perfect for contemplative evenings and spirited gatherings alike.

name: Oh Captain My Captain
description: Oh Captain My Captain is a vibrant and tropical cocktail that blends the bold, spiced flavors of Captain Morgan Spiced Gold rum with the exotic sweetness of maracuja (passion fruit) nectar. Balanced with bright lemon and lime juices, a hint of vanilla syrup adds smoothness, while a dash of grenadine syrup gives a subtle color and fruity undertone. Served in a hurricane glass, this drink is refreshing, tangy, and just sweet enough—a perfect choice for rum lovers and those seeking a lively, tropical vibe.

name: Old Cuban
description: The Old Cuban offers a sophisticated fusion of rum, fresh mint, and sparkling wine, creating a truly celebratory drink. With vibrant citrus and herbal notes, balanced by a touch of bitters and the effervescence of prosecco, it's perfect for toasting special occasions or unwinding during a warm evening.

name: Old Fashioned
description: A timeless classic, the Old Fashioned offers an elegant balance of smooth bourbon, subtle bitters, and the gentle sweetness of sugar. Its rich aromas and depth of flavor make it the go-to drink for sophisticated evenings, contemplative moments, and celebrations of tradition.

name: Old Friend
description: A lively blend for sophisticated palates, the Old Friend cocktail unites the floral sweetness of elderflower liqueur, the herbal undertones of gin, the bittersweet charm of Aperol, and the tart zest of pink grapefruit juice. Served elegantly in a cocktail glass, this drink shines at sunset gatherings or whenever you wish to toast to great company. Bright, well-balanced, and endlessly refreshing—it's a modern classic you'll want to revisit.

name: Orange Daiquiri
description: A vibrant twist on the timeless Daiquiri, the Orange Daiquiri features harmonious notes of bold gold rum balanced with zesty orange and lime juice. This refreshing cocktail delivers an invigorating blend of sweet, tangy, and citrus flavors—making it a perfect choice for sunlit gatherings or as a bright, spirited finale to any day.

name: Orgasm
description: A decadent blend of creamy Bailey's, rich coffee liqueur, and nutty Amaretto, the Orgasm is the ultimate dessert cocktail. Smooth vodka and fresh cream round out the recipe, creating a velvety and indulgent treat that's perfect for a nightcap or a special celebration. Sip slowly to savor every luscious layer.

name: Paloma
description: The Paloma delights with a brisk, citrus-forward character, seamlessly uniting the crispness of tequila with grapefruit and lime for a thirst-quenching experience. Perfect for sunny afternoons or as a lively party refresher, this Mexican classic offers a bright, sparkling taste adventure.

name: Paper Plane
description: A contemporary classic, the Paper Plane offers a modern twist with delightful balance. Bitter-sweet Aperol and rich Amaro mingle with smooth Bourbon, sharpened by tart lemon juice. Elegantly served in a cocktail glass, it’s perfect for lively gatherings or contemplative evenings, delivering a bright, bittersweet flavor journey that’s approachable for all palates.

name: Parson’s Special
description: A refreshing non-alcoholic delight, the Parson’s Special blends smooth orange juice with a touch of grenadine and airy egg white for a silky, citrusy experience. First published in Harry Craddock’s iconic 'Savoy Cocktail Book', this mocktail is a sophisticated and flavorful option for any occasion, capturing the joy of classic cocktails without the alcohol.

name: Passion Fruit Daiquiri
description: A Passion Fruit Daiquiri bursts with tropical flavor—fresh passion fruit delivers tangy brightness, while zesty lime juice and a touch of simple syrup create a perfectly balanced tang and sweetness. Gold rum brings warmth and depth, resulting in a vibrant, refreshing cocktail, ideal for sun-soaked afternoons or festive gatherings.

name: Passion Fruit Margarita
description: Tropical and lively, the Passion Fruit Margarita fuses the rich depth of tequila with zesty lime and the tangy brightness of passion fruit. This reimagined classic offers a refreshing escape—a perfect mix for sun-drenched gatherings and festive evenings. Sweet agave and orange liqueur balance the tart fruit, delivering an exotic flavor wave in every chilled sip.

name: Passion Fruit Mojito
description: A vibrant twist on the classic mojito, this cocktail balances the herbaceous freshness of muddled mint with the sweet-tart zing of passion fruit. Lively and tropical, it's the perfect refreshment for warm evenings or whenever you crave a taste of summer. Expect an invigorating sip that bursts with flavor and invites you to relax and unwind.

name: Pegu Club
description: A sophisticated balance of gin, citrus, and aromatic bitters, the Pegu Club offers a crisp, zesty, and slightly exotic flavor profile. Refreshing yet layered, it's ideal for sipping during elegant soirées or contemplative evenings.

name: Pineapple Martini
description: A lively fusion of sweet pineapple and crisp citrus dancing with smooth vodka, the Pineapple Martini brings a taste of the tropics in every sip. Served chilled in a classic cocktail glass, its sunny notes of pineapple juice are balanced perfectly by tart lime and a kiss of simple syrup, making it the ideal drink for celebrations, sunset gatherings, or any moment you crave a refreshing escape.

name: Pink Fizz
description: A lively, alcohol-free delight, the Pink Fizz combines sweet orange with tart cranberry and a sparkling burst of ginger beer. Perfect for sunny afternoons or festive occasions, it offers a vibrant, fruity sip with a subtle spicy zing—refreshing and full of energy for everyone to enjoy.

name: Piscola
description: A staple of Chilean and Peruvian cocktail culture, the Piscola delivers a bold yet refreshing harmony of aromatic pisco, bitters, and bubbly cola. Perfectly chilled over ice, it's celebrated for its bright flavor and is often enjoyed during lively summer evenings or festive gatherings.

name: Piña Colada
description: A creamy, tropical escape in a glass, the Piña Colada blends the mellow sweetness of coconut cream with the bright, juicy taste of pineapple and the warming kick of white rum. This iconic Puerto Rican classic evokes sunny beaches and swaying palms—a guilty pleasure perfect for vacation daydreamers and summer afternoons.

name: Planter’s Punch
description: A vibrant and refreshing classic from Jamaica, Planter’s Punch is a sunny blend of rum and citrus sweetened for a perfectly tropical escape. Its balanced flavors make it a go-to for warm-weather relaxation and festive gatherings alike.

name: Planter’s Tea
description: A warming cocktail that mingles rich black tea with fresh orange and lemon juices, elevated by a touch of dark rum. The Planter’s Tea delivers soothing citrus brightness, robust tea tannins, and a depth of spirit, making it the perfect drink to chase away a cold evening or lend an air of comfort to a relaxing lounge. Sweetness and strength are both tailored to your taste for a personalized and sophisticated sipping experience.

name: Poet's Dream
description: A refined and elegant cocktail, the Poet's Dream blends crisp white vermouth, herbal DOM Benedictine, and dry gin into a poetic symphony of flavors. Perfect for lovers of classic cocktails, this drink delights the palate with a balance of sweetness, herbal undertones, and a clean, dry finish, making it an ideal choice for contemplative evenings or sophisticated gatherings.

name: Port Old-Fashioned
description: A refined take on the timeless Old-Fashioned, the Port Old-Fashioned blends smooth bourbon with the velvety richness of port wine. Sweet maple syrup rounds out its depth, resulting in a spirit-forward cocktail that offers comfort and luxury in every sip. Ideal for a relaxed evening or special celebration.

name: Pousse Café
description: A visually stunning showpiece, the Pousse Café is a masterclass in layers—each sip unveils vibrant flavors, from the rich depth of coffee liqueur and bourbon to the sweet, minty sparkle of crème de menthe, ending with a bright citrus twist. Perfect for special toasts or as an eye-catching party starter.

name: Presbyterian
description: Experience the Presbyterian—a revitalizing highball that perfectly balances the depth of whisky with sparkling soda water and the spicy effervescence of ginger ale. Ideal for a casual evening or as a sophisticated refresher, this cocktail delivers a harmonious fusion of mellow, spirited warmth and zesty, crisp refreshment.

name: Queen's Park Swizzle
description: The Queen's Park Swizzle is an iconic cocktail born in Trinidad and Tobago’s vibrant Queen's Park Hotel. With its medley of cooling mint, tart lime, and the warmth of rum, it’s a drink designed for tropical refreshment. The aromatic bitters rise to the top, enhancing every sip with spice. Ideal for summer evenings or when you crave a taste of the Caribbean, this swizzle promises a lively, invigorating experience.

productionSteps.message: Gently press the mint with rum at the bottom of your glass to release flavors. Swizzle or churn with crushed ice using a swizzle stick or bar spoon, then top off with additional crushed ice.

name: Rabo-de-Galo
description: Experience a captivating journey of flavor with the Rabo-de-Galo, a classic Brazilian cocktail that artfully marries the earthy strength of Cachaça with the herbal sweetness of red vermouth and the aromatic complexity of amaro. A nuance of grapefruit bitters provides a fresh, zesty lift, making this drink the perfect choice for those who appreciate a sophisticated balance of bitter, sweet, and citrus notes. Whether you prefer it shaken, stirred, or thrown, its layered character delivers a memorable taste of cultural fusion—ideal for evening sipping or sharing with cocktail connoisseurs.

name: Ramos Fizz
description: The Ramos Fizz is a legendary New Orleans classic known for its uniquely creamy, frothy texture and bright citrus. Blending gin, lemon and lime, cream, and a swirl of vanilla with a hint of orange flower water, this cocktail delivers a delicate, floral, and refreshing experience. Perfect for a brunch, a summer celebration, or whenever you crave an invigorating, velvety treat.

name: Raspberry Lift-off
description: The Raspberry Lift-off is a vivid, effervescent creation that bursts with juicy fruit flavors and lively bubbles. Combining the sweetness of orange juice, the floral zing of raspberry, and the celebratory sparkle of prosecco, this cocktail is perfect for brunches, celebrations, or any occasion that deserves a refreshing twist. Experience a true lift-off with each sip as the fruit and fizz blend for a truly uplifting moment.

name: Raspberry Lynchburg
description: Enjoy a vibrant blend of sweet raspberry and tart citrus with smooth whisky at the heart of this colorful highball. A lively fusion of effervescent soda, fresh lime, and a hint of syrup makes this cocktail a refreshing choice for summer evenings or lively celebrations.

name: Raspberry Martini
description: A vibrant and alluring cocktail, the Raspberry Martini blends smooth vodka, luscious raspberry liqueur, and a touch of simple syrup for a perfectly balanced sweet-tart flavor. Fresh raspberries heighten the cocktail's fruitiness, making every sip a refreshing and sophisticated delight. Ideal for summer evenings or any festive occasion.

name: Rattlesnake
description: A classic shaken cocktail, the Rattlesnake delivers a captivating fusion of spicy rye whiskey, herbal absinthe, and tangy lemon juice, enriched by the creamy texture of egg white and the mellow sweetness of simple syrup. With an invigorating, silky finish, it's a sophisticated drink perfect for adventurous evenings or when you want to experience a timeless classic with a twist.

name: Reggae Rum Punch
description: Experience the vibrant spirit of Jamaica with the Reggae Rum Punch, a lively blend of tangy lime, bold overproof rum, sweet pineapple and orange juices, and luscious strawberry syrup. Perfect for sunny gatherings or whenever you crave a taste of the tropics, this punch delivers waves of fruity refreshment and a cheerful kick.

name: Remember the Maine
description: Uncover a legend with the Remember the Maine cocktail—a robust mix of whisky, cherry liqueur, and vermouth accented by a dash of absinthe. Aromatic, spirit-forward, and deeply satisfying, this classic is perfect for sipping on a contemplative evening or impressing aficionados of old-world cocktails.

name: Right Hand
description: Rich Jamaican rum meets the bittersweet notes of Aperol and vermouth in this layered classic, perfect for sipping when you want a cocktail that’s both bold and refined with a subtle chocolatey finish.

name: Ritz
description: A luxurious cocktail inspired by French elegance, the Ritz blends the rich warmth of Cognac with lively orange and a sparkling champagne finish, making it the perfect celebration drink for sophisticated occasions.

name: Rob Roy
description: The Rob Roy delivers a timeless blend of smoky whisky and velvety sweet vermouth, rounded off with a subtle spice from Angostura bitters. Perfect for sophisticated evenings or moments of contemplation, this iconic cocktail embodies classic elegance and Scottish spirit.

name: Rockshandy
description: The Rockshandy is a lively, non-alcoholic refresher that balances spicy ginger notes with the tangy brightness of lemon-lime soda. Its fizz and vibrant flavors make it the perfect thirst-quencher for sunny afternoons, picnics, or as a sophisticated alternative to classic soda mixes. Enjoy its crisp, invigorating taste in a tall glass over ice for maximum refreshment.

name: Rome With a View
description: Experience the feeling of a Roman afternoon with the Rome With a View cocktail. Bright, lively, and refreshingly bittersweet, this drink combines the herbal qualities of white vermouth and Aperol with a zestful splash of lime juice and a subtle touch of simple syrup. Finished with a lively fizz of soda water, it’s the perfect companion for languid summer evenings or stylish aperitivo hours.

name: Rose
description: A delicate, elegant cocktail marrying the bright, aromatic nature of white vermouth with the sweet depth of cherry liqueur. The strawberry syrup weaves in subtle fruitiness, yielding a lightly sweet and refreshing drink that looks as sophisticated as it tastes—ideal for a serene evening or a spirited celebration.

name: Rosemary Old Fashioned
description: A deeply aromatic twist on the classic Old Fashioned, this cocktail blends the bold sweetness of bourbon with the piney freshness of muddled rosemary. Accented with bitters and a gentle touch of sugar, every sip offers a sophisticated and earthy experience, perfect for cozy evenings or elegant gatherings.

name: Rum Louis
description: A journey to the tropics in a glass, the Rum Louis entices with a refreshing medley of pineapple, orange, and grapefruit juices, perfectly accented by the dual embrace of white and dark rums. Zesty citrus, layered sweetness, and a touch of complexity make this highball ideal for lively summer gatherings or simply savoring paradise at sunset.

name: Rum Old Fashioned
description: This Rum Old Fashioned reimagines the classic with a punchy Caribbean spirit. Earthy Jamaican rum and overproof rum set a bold foundation, while falernum syrup weaves in subtle spice and citrus. A splash of simple syrup and a dash of Angostura Bitters round out the drink, making it a smooth yet complex sipper. Enjoy this cocktail when you crave tradition with a sun-soaked tropical twist.

name: Rum Sour
description: A lively and refreshing twist on the classic sour, the Rum Sour shines with rich Jamaican rum balanced by the tartness of lime and orange juice. Creamy egg white adds luxurious texture and a velvety finish, making this cocktail a perfect indulgence for sultry evenings or festive gatherings.

name: Rum Swizzle
description: A tropical Caribbean delight, the Rum Swizzle is a bold and refreshing cocktail that bursts with citrus, mellow sweetness, and a touch of warm spice. Featuring the rich depth of Jamaican rum, lively lime and lemon juices, velvety simple syrup, aromatic falernum, and a signature dash of Angostura Bitters, it's an energetic, sun-soaked drink perfect for unwinding or celebrating summer nights.

name: Rusty Nail
description: A smooth yet commanding blend, the Rusty Nail unites the honeyed, spiced charm of Drambuie with the warming depth of whisky. This timeless cocktail delivers a sweetly aromatic experience with an underlying robustness—perfect for slow sipping by candlelight or sharing at a refined gathering.

name: Saint Clement’s
description: A lively, invigorating mocktail that brings together the sweet zest of orange juice with the light fizz of lemon-lime soda. Perfect for any sunny afternoon, the Saint Clement’s will brighten your spirits without a drop of alcohol. Its vibrant flavors and easy sipping make it an ideal choice for gatherings and celebrations.

name: Salty Dog
description: A refreshing classic for any sunny day, the Salty Dog delivers crisp botanicals from gin fused with the tangy brightness of grapefruit juice. Its famous salted rim adds a savory note that heightens the natural zesty flavors, making each sip delightfully vibrant and memorable.

productionSteps.message: Moisten the rim of a highball glass and roll it in salt.

name: Sangaree
description: A vibrant and refreshing individual cocktail, the Sangaree intertwines the depth of red wine and brandy with citrusy brightness and subtle sweetness. Perfect for summer evenings or as a sophisticated aperitif, its 19th-century heritage infuses each glass with charm and a hint of nostalgia.

name: Sangria
description: A lively, fruit-forward Spanish classic, Sangria entices with its blend of red wine and citrus, balanced by a touch of sweetness and a refreshing effervescence. Perfect for sunny gatherings or warm evenings with friends.

name: Sazerac
description: Experience a piece of New Orleans history with the Sazerac—a refined, timeless blend where herbal absinthe enlivens rich cognac, gently warmed with bitters and subtly sweetened. This signature cocktail unveils layers of complexity, making each sip both bold and elegant. Ideal for contemplative evenings or celebrating special moments, the Sazerac is quintessential sophistication in a glass.

name: Scorpion
description: Dive into the tropical allure of the Scorpion—a cocktail where vibrant orange and lemon juice collide with the rich embrace of Cognac and gold rum. The result is a dazzling harmony of citrus and smooth, sun-kissed spirits, all sweetly balanced by orgeat syrup. Refreshing yet complex, the Scorpion evokes the spirit of island evenings and is perfect for savoring with friends on any festive occasion.

name: Scotch Sour
description: Bold yet perfectly balanced, the Scotch Sour delights with the smoky richness of whisky paired with tangy lemon and silky egg white. This timeless classic is both invigorating and smooth, ideal for sipping as a refined aperitif or after a long day. Expect vibrant aromas, a velvety texture, and a sweet-tart profile—Scotland’s answer to the quintessential sour experience.

name: Screwdriver
description: Simple, zesty, and endlessly refreshing, the Screwdriver delivers a perfect marriage of crisp vodka and vibrant orange juice. Ideal for sunny brunches or a leisurely evening, this no-fuss classic balances sweetness and citrus tang in every sip—making it a timeless favorite.

name: Seabreeze
description: A classic cocktail that transports you to the shoreline, the Seabreeze mixes crisp vodka with tart cranberry juice and a splash of bright grapefruit juice for a lively, thirst-quenching experience. It's the perfect companion for sunny days and long, laid-back afternoons—light, tangy, and endlessly refreshing.

name: Sex on the Beach
description: Experience a taste of sunshine with this fruity and vibrant cocktail. The Sex on the Beach is a lively blend of vodka, peach liqueur, and tangy fruit juices, perfect for relaxing with friends or transporting yourself to a sun-soaked beach. Its refreshing, sweet-tart finish makes it a favorite for festive occasions and summer celebrations.

name: Sgroppino
description: Experience a taste of Italian elegance with the Sgroppino, where zesty lemon sorbet meets crisp prosecco and silky vodka in a frosty blend. Cream adds a velvety finish to this festive, palate-cleansing cocktail that's perfect for celebrations or as a sophisticated dessert. Refreshing, tangy, and effervescent, it's a spirited toast to la dolce vita.

productionSteps.message: Blend all ingredients until smooth, ensuring no ice is added. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of fruit or a sprig of mint if desired.

name: Shade Thrower
description: Dive into a daring, spirit-driven twist ideal for slow evenings or warm summer nights. Shade Thrower delivers robust bourbon depth mingled with herbal amaro, a splash of white vermouth, and a subtle cherry note, all rounded by aromatic bitters. Perfect for unwinding in style.

name: Shaft
description: Experience the irresistible richness of the Shaft, a coffee-forward cocktail that expertly blends creamy liqueurs and vodka. With an invigorating coffee base layered with notes of velvety Bailey's and cocoa-like liqueur, every sip provides a delicious pick-me-up for late nights or lively brunches. Perfect for lovers of dessert cocktails and anyone seeking a smooth yet invigorating treat.

name: Shirley Temple
description: A timeless non-alcoholic classic, the Shirley Temple charms with its vibrant flavors and playful sparkle. Crisp lemon juice meets sweet grenadine and a generous pour of ginger ale in a tall highball glass, creating a refreshing beverage that's both nostalgic and festive. Perfect for celebrations of all ages, it's the ideal mocktail for any gathering where everyone wants to feel special.

name: Sidecar
description: A timeless cocktail that harmoniously blends the warming richness of cognac with zesty lemon juice and the sweet complexity of orange liqueur. Perfect for elegant evenings or special celebrations, the Sidecar offers a crisp and refreshing experience with every sip.

name: Singapore Sling
description: Experience the vibrant tropical allure of the Singapore Sling, a classic shaken cocktail famed for its lively red color and tantalizing medley of fruits and botanicals. Perfect for a refreshing escape to summer evenings or festive gatherings, this drink elegantly balances gin's complexity with lush pineapple, sweet cherry, and a hint of citrus.

name: Slush Puppie
description: A playful, vibrant mocktail perfect for hot afternoons or fun gatherings. The refreshing zing of lemon blends seamlessly with the sweet bursts of grenadine and raspberry syrup, topped with fizzy soda water for a thirst-quenching treat. Whether for kids or adults seeking a flavorful non-alcoholic delight, the Slush Puppie delivers classic slushy nostalgia in every sip.

name: Solero
description: The Solero is a vibrant gin-based cocktail that perfectly balances tropical and citrus flavors. Combining 80 ml of sweet and tangy maracuja nectar, 50 ml of smooth gin, 20 ml of fresh lemon juice, and a hint of grenadine syrup, this drink offers a refreshing and colorful experience. Served in a hurricane glass, the Solero is both visually stunning and deliciously fruity, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a lively and invigorating cocktail with a tropical twist.

name: Soma Bay
description: The Soma Bay is a vibrant and refreshing cocktail that combines the zesty notes of orange and pineapple juice with the bold flavors of vodka and gin. Enhanced by a splash of triple sec, lemon juice, and a touch of lime, this drink offers a delightful citrus profile. Finished with a hint of grenadine syrup for a sweet, rosy hue, the Soma Bay is perfect for those who love a fruity cocktail with a kick. Traditionally served in a jumbo glass, it's ideal for parties or relaxing by the beach.

name: South of Brooklyn
description: An elegant twist on the Brooklyn, the South of Brooklyn is a bold yet nuanced cocktail that melds the spice of rye whisky, the depth of dark rum, and the delicate herbal notes of white vermouth. Livened with a whisper of amaro and a touch of maraschino liqueur, each sip layers mild sweetness and gentle bitterness atop a silky foundation. Ideal for contemplative evenings and social celebrations alike, this drink finishes with a note of fruit and a hint of intrigue.

name: Southside
description: The Southside is a crisp and refreshing gin-based cocktail, perfect for any occasion. This classic drink is crafted by combining 60 ml of gin with 20 ml of tangy lemon juice and 10 ml of simple syrup, resulting in a balanced mix of botanical, citrusy, and sweet flavors. Served in a cocktail bowl, it offers a smooth, invigorating taste experience that highlights the aromatic notes of gin, complemented by the bright zest of lemon and subtle sweetness of the syrup.

name: Spicy Mango Margarita
description: A bold and vibrant twist on the classic margarita, this cocktail pairs the tropical sweetness of mango puree with the fiery kick of habanero and the crisp notes of tequila blanco. Balanced with orange liqueur and a touch of agave, the Spicy Mango Margarita delights adventurous palates and is perfect for lively summer gatherings.

productionSteps.message: Optionally rim the glass with chili powder and coarse sea salt for extra flavor.

name: Spring Fever
description: Bright, juicy, and refreshingly tropical, Spring Fever is the perfect mocktail to evoke the feeling of a sun-filled orchard in bloom. Orange and apple juices bring crisp vibrance, lemon juice adds a lively citrus zing, and a dash of mango puree infuses a lush, exotic sweetness. This is the ultimate drink for enjoying the spirit of spring—beautifully balanced and bursting with fresh fruit flavors.

name: Stinger
description: A bold after-dinner cocktail, the Stinger combines the smooth warmth of cognac with a refreshing touch of mint liqueur. Its cooling finish and simplicity have made it a sophisticated favorite for winding down at upscale gatherings or relaxing evenings.

name: Sunset
description: Experience the radiance of a summer evening with the Sunset. This invigorating mocktail blends the juicy brightness of orange juice with a splash of energizing drink, finishing with the dramatic, ruby glow of grenadine syrup sinking to the bottom. It's a lively, alcohol-free refresher that's as vibrant as its namesake—perfect for daytime parties or a festive toast without the buzz.

name: Swimming Pool
description: The Swimming Pool cocktail is a vibrant, tropical drink that blends the fruity sweetness of pineapple juice, creamy coconut syrup, and rich cream with a splash of rum and vodka for a spirited kick. Finished with a touch of Blue Curaçao, it takes on an inviting blue hue reminiscent of a crystal-clear pool. Served in a hurricane glass, this cocktail is a refreshing, creamy, and indulgent choice—perfect for relaxing, summer occasions or any time you crave a taste of vacation.

name: Tequila Mix
description: Experience a lively fusion of flavors in the Tequila Mix, where aged Tequila Añejo offers deep, nuanced character balanced by zesty lime juice and the gentle fruitiness of grenadine syrup. The touch of Angostura Bitters adds complexity and subtle spice, making this shaken classic perfect for celebratory occasions and late-night gatherings.

name: Tequila Sour
description: The Tequila Sour is a vibrant and refreshing cocktail that combines 60 ml of smooth Tequila Blanco with 40 ml of tart lemon juice and 20 ml of simple syrup. Served in a rocks glass, this classic drink balances bold, citrusy flavors with a touch of sweetness, making it the perfect choice for tequila lovers seeking a zesty and invigorating cocktail experience.

name: Tequila Sunrise
description: Experience the dazzling allure of a Tequila Sunrise—a cocktail famous for its mesmerizing layers that evoke the colors of a sunrise. Bold notes of agave-infused tequila merge with vibrant, sweet orange juice, while a gentle swirl of grenadine provides a striking visual effect and a touch of berry sweetness. Perfect for leisurely brunches and sunny afternoons, this drink is both refreshing and visually captivating.

name: The CocktailPi
description: The CocktailPi is a refreshing, balanced cocktail made for makers, hackers, and tinkerers. It's smooth and slightly fruity, with just enough kick to enjoy multiple rounds while debugging code or celebrating a successful solder joint.

name: The Ella
description: The Ella is a luscious, alcohol-free treat that delights with the bright zest of orange juice and the gentle sweetness of apple juice, all brought together by creamy vanilla ice cream. This drink is perfect for those seeking a dessert-like refreshment that is both invigorating and indulgent—ideal for afternoons in the sun or winding down with a sweet, velvety sip.

name: The Perfect Martini
description: A seamless blend of gin's crisp botanicals and the herbal richness of red vermouth, The Perfect Martini is elevated by a touch of olive brine for a savory depth. This cocktail is the embodiment of classic elegance, perfect for those who appreciate a refined, spirit-forward drink in sophisticated settings.

name: The Real Blood and Sand
description: A modern take on the classic Blood and Sand, The Real Blood and Sand features smooth Añejo tequila blending harmoniously with sweet orange juice, tart cherry liqueur, and rich red vermouth. The result is a vibrant, nuanced cocktail perfect for evening celebrations and those who love bold yet balanced drinks.

name: Three Dots and a Dash
description: Dive into a wave of tropical indulgence with Three Dots and a Dash—a tiki masterpiece offering a luscious fusion of golden and Jamaican rum, zesty citrus, and exotic spices. Each sip conjures images of sunny beaches, festive nights, and vibrant island vibes, making it a perfect companion for lively gatherings or those moments when you crave a taste of paradise.

name: Ti Punch
description: Dive into the Caribbean spirit with the Ti Punch, a brisk and zesty classic that lets the boldness of white rum shine. With a whisper of simple syrup and the essence of lime, Ti Punch is the ultimate minimalist refreshment—perfect for sunny afternoons and evenings filled with conversation and relaxation.

name: Tia Mia
description: Dive into the adventurous spirit of the Tia Mia—a cocktail that brings together the tropical boldness of Jamaican rum and the smoky intrigue of mezcal. Tart lime juice, velvety orgeat syrup, and a touch of simple syrup dance together with a hint of orange liqueur, crafting a layered and refreshing drink that electrifies the palate and soothes the soul. Perfect for cozy nights or lively gatherings, the Tia Mia promises a unique blend of sweetness, smoke, and citrus harmony.

name: Tiger’s Milk
description: Rich, creamy, and indulgent, Tiger’s Milk brings together the opulence of Cognac with velvety milk and cream. The cocktail is rounded out by a gentle sweetness, subtle spice, and a whisper of aromatic vanilla. Perfect for cozy evenings or after-dinner sipping, this drink tempts with its inviting comfort and luxurious depth.

productionSteps.message: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled rocks glass. Optionally, sprinkle ground nutmeg on top before serving.

name: Tipperary No.1
description: The Tipperary No.1 is a refined and aromatic classic, uniting the smooth depth of whisky with the sweet vermouth’s spice and the unique herbal character of green Chartreuse. This cocktail offers a well-balanced and elegant experience, perfect for savoring during a quiet evening or at a sophisticated gathering.

name: Tom Collins
description: A lively mix of bright lemon and botanical gin, balanced with a gentle sweetness and a refreshing burst of fizz. The Tom Collins is the perfect companion for sunny afternoons and laid-back gatherings, delivering an effervescent twist to classic gin enjoyment.

name: Touch Down
description: The Touch Down is a refreshing and vibrant cocktail that combines the smoothness of vodka with the tropical sweetness of maracuja nectar and the fruity depth of apricot brandy. Balanced with a tangy burst from lemon and lime juice, and finished with a hint of grenadine syrup, this drink offers a perfect harmony of flavors. Served in a jumbo glass, it's a crowd-pleaser ideal for lively gatherings or a relaxing evening. Expect a slightly tart, fruity profile with a visually striking presentation.

name: Tropical Cooler
description: Enjoy a stroll through a sun-soaked paradise with the Tropical Cooler—a vibrant non-alcoholic drink bursting with the tangy sweetness of fresh pineapple, orange, lemon, and grapefruit juices, accented by luscious grenadine. Perfect for any moment you crave refreshing, tropical escape without the alcohol. Bright, lively, and packed with island spirit!

name: Ultima Palabra
description: A modern classic, the Ultima Palabra dazzles with complex herbal notes from Green Chartreuse, zingy freshness from lime, tropical sweetness from pineapple, and enigmatic richness from Maraschino liqueur. Mezcal brings a smoky finish, while each sip is lively and thoroughly captivating—ideal for special cocktail moments.

name: Vancouver
description: A sophisticated cocktail inspired by the cosmopolitan spirit of Vancouver, this drink balances the herbal depth of DOM Benedictine with the crisp botanicals of gin, harmonized by the subtle sweetness of red and white vermouth. It's an elegant sip—complex, aromatic, and perfect for an evening of refined relaxation.

name: Vesper
description: A sophisticated and potent classic favored by James Bond, the Vesper combines the crispness of vodka, the herbal complexity of gin, and the delicate floral touch of Lillet Blanc. Shaken for a crisp chill and served with a twist of lemon, it's perfect for an evening of elegance or intrigue.

name: Vesper Dry Martini
description: A sophisticated, timeless cocktail with international flair, the Vesper Dry Martini delivers a crisp, refreshing experience. Its unique blend of dry gin and vodka is elegantly softened by Lillet Blanc, making it the perfect drink for special evenings or whenever you want to channel your inner James Bond.

name: Virgin Colada
description: A lush, tropical escape in a glass—enjoy the refreshing symphony of pineapple, orange, passion fruit, and creamy coconut in this non-alcoholic Virgin Colada. With its vibrant, sun-kissed flavors and silky texture, this mocktail brings island vibes and pure pleasure with every sip. It’s the perfect companion for any celebration or a cool afternoon pick-me-up, ideal for anyone seeking a rich, exotic drink without the alcohol.

name: Virgin Mojito
description: The Virgin Mojito is the ultimate alcohol-free refresher, blending zesty lime juice with crisp apple juice and sweet simple syrup, all muddled together with vibrant mint leaves. Served over ice, it delivers a cooling, invigorating experience perfect for warm days or anyone seeking a lively mocktail with a burst of citrus and mint.

name: Virgin Piña Colada
description: Enjoy a taste of the tropics with this creamy, alcohol-free twist on the classic Piña Colada. Smooth coconut cream blends seamlessly with sweet pineapple juice for a refreshing and indulgent treat, perfect for sunny afternoons by the pool or festive gatherings. This mocktail captures the lush, velvety character of the original while remaining completely booze-free.

name: Virgin Strawberry Daiquiri
description: A playful and refreshing non-alcoholic treat, the Virgin Strawberry Daiquiri bursts with zesty lime and sweet, juicy strawberries. It's perfect for sunny afternoons or festive family gatherings—delivering all the excitement of a classic daiquiri, without the alcohol. Ideal as a fruity slushy for kids or anyone who loves the pure taste of summer berries.

productionSteps.message: Blend all ingredients with ice until smooth, then pour into the glass.

name: Vodka Martini
description: A symbol of timeless sophistication, the Vodka Martini channels elegance and clarity in every sip. Crisp, clean vodka harmonizes with aromatic white vermouth to create a silky, cool classic best enjoyed before dinner or on a night out. This signature drink captures a spirit of urbane glamour and refined taste.

name: Vodka Sour
description: A crisp and vibrant cocktail, the Vodka Sour brings together the silky smoothness of vodka with bright citrus and a subtle sweetness. Topped with a frothy egg white and a touch of bitters, each sip is an elegant harmony—ideal for lively gatherings or intimate evenings.

name: Vodkatini
description: Crisp, clean, and timeless, the Vodkatini—also known as the Vodka Martini—showcases vodka's clarity and the subtle aromatics of white vermouth. Perfect for stylish evenings or whenever you want a cocktail that's both simple and sophisticated.

name: Ward 8
description: A classic cocktail with origins traced to late 19th-century Boston, the Ward 8 delivers a harmonious blend of vibrant citrus and rich rye, accented by a touch of sweet grenadine. Its balanced, subtly tart profile and striking color make it a timeless favorite for celebrations and refined evenings.

name: Ward Eight #2
description: Experience a taste of American cocktail history with the Ward Eight #2—smooth rye whisky forms the backbone, brightened by crisp lemon and orange juice. Accented with a touch of simple syrup and a splash of grenadine syrup, this classic strikes the perfect balance between citrus, sweetness, and bold whisky warmth. Ideal for sophisticated evenings or late-night conversation.

name: Watermelon Fruitini
description: A bright and refreshing cocktail that brings together the luscious flavor of fresh watermelon, crisp vodka, and a dash of syrupy sweetness. Perfect for pool parties or sun-drenched afternoons, the Watermelon Fruitini delivers a juicy, invigorating sip that’s both fun and sophisticated.

name: Whiskey Collins
description: Bright, sunny, and endlessly refreshing, the Whiskey Collins is the perfect union of bourbon's caramel warmth and sharp, citrusy lemon juice. Balanced with a touch of sweet simple syrup, nuanced by a dash of bitters, and brought alive with the lively fizz of soda water, it’s a lively long drink made for slow sipping on a summer afternoon or for uplifting any classic cocktail hour.

name: Whisky and Coke
description: An effortlessly smooth classic, the Whisky and Coke blends the rich, warming character of whisky with the sweet, fizzy refreshment of cola. Perfect for casual gatherings or unwinding after a long day, this highball strikes a harmonious balance between robust spirit and nostalgic soda, making it a go-to favorite for cocktail lovers worldwide.

name: Whisky Mac
description: A timeless British duo of whisky and ginger wine, the Whisky Mac brings together smooth, smoky spirit and sweet, spicy warmth. Perfect for chilly evenings or fireside gatherings, it offers a bold yet approachable balance of flavors that speak to tradition and comfort.

name: Whisky Sour
description: A timeless classic cocktail, the Whisky Sour marries the zesty brightness of lemon juice with the smooth, rich warmth of bourbon and a silky foam from egg white. Its balance of tartness and sweetness makes it perfect for savoring during a relaxed evening or to add a sophisticated touch to a gathering. Enjoy the harmonious blend of flavors that has delighted cocktail lovers for generations.

name: White Lady
description: A timeless, elegant gin-based cocktail with citrus brightness and a touch of orange sweetness, the White Lady is perfect for an evening of sophistication or as a lively start to a celebratory night. Bring a taste of 1920s Paris to your glass and enjoy its crisp, balanced flavor in excellent company.

name: White Negroni
description: A modern, floral riff on the classic Negroni, the White Negroni strikes a beautiful balance with crisp botanicals, the gentle sweetness of Lillet Blanc, and the assertive bitterness of gentian. Elegant and nuanced, this refreshingly complex cocktail is the perfect choice for those seeking a sophisticated sipper to impress at any stylish occasion.

name: White Russian
description: Indulge in the White Russian, a luxurious classic that combines creamy richness and deep coffee notes. Perfect for cozy evenings, it’s a sophisticated sipper that brings smooth flavor and a laid-back vibe to your glass.

name: Widow's Kiss
description: The Widow's Kiss delivers a beguiling blend of herbal and apple flavors, where the warmth of Calvados entwines with the sweet complexity of DOM Benedictine and Yellow Chartreuse. A dash of bitters gives subtle spice, making this classic cocktail a perfect companion for contemplative evenings or sophisticated celebrations.

name: Zombie
description: A true tiki classic, the Zombie is a vibrant and powerful cocktail famed for its blend of richly layered rums, hints of spice, and tart lime. With tropical allure and formidable strength, it’s the ultimate indulgence for adventurous nights, best enjoyed with friends and a splash of island escapism.
